uv30#30.1: jayād vairaṁ prasavate duḥkhaṁ śete parājitaḥ । upaśāntaḥ sukhaṁ śete hitvā jayaparājayau ।।
uv30#30.2: paraduḥkhopadhānena ya icchet sukham ātmanaḥ । vairasaṁsargasaṁsakto duḥkhān na parimucyate ।।
uv30#30.3: sukhakāmāni bhūtāni yo daṇḍena vihiṁsati । ātmanaḥ sukham eṣāṇaḥ sa vai na labhate sukham ।।
uv30#30.4: sukhakāmāni bhūtāni yo daṇḍena na hiṁsati । ātmanaḥ sukham eṣānaḥ sa pretya labhate sukham ।।
uv30#30.5: dharmaṁ caret sucaritaṁ nainaṁ duścaritaṁ caret । dharmacārī sukhaṁ śete hy asmiṁ loke paratra ca ।।
uv30#30.6: dharmaḥ sadā rakṣati dharmacāriṇaṁ chatraṁ mahadvarṣakāle yathaiva । eṣānuśaṁso dharme sucīrṇe na durgatiṁ gacchati dharmacārī ।।
uv30#30.7: dharmaḥ sadā rakṣati dharmacāriṇaṁ dharmaḥ sucīrṇaḥ sukham ādadhāti eṣānuśaṁso dharme sucīrṇe na durgatiṁ gacchati dharmacārī ।।
uv30#30.8: alpāpi santo bahavo jayanti susaṁvidhāne na saṁvidhānam । alpam api cec chraddadhāno dadāti tenaivāsau bhavati sukhī paratra ।।
uv30#30.9: dānaṁ ca yuddhaṁ ca samānam āhur naite guṇāḥ kāpuruṣeva santi । saṁgrāmaveleva hi dānavelā tulyaṁ bhavet kāraṇasaṁgraheṇa ।।
uv30#30.10: ayaṁ hi pratyūhaśatāni jitvā mātsaryam ākramya ca śatrubhūtam । śurād dhi taṁ śūrataraṁ vadāmi dadāti yo dānam asaktacittaḥ ।।
uv30#30.11: sukho vipākaḥ puṇyānām abhiprāyaḥ samṛdhyate । kṣipraṁ ca paramāṁ śāntiṁ nirvṛtiṁ so 'dhigacchati ।।
uv30#30.12: parato hy upasargāṁś ca devatā mārakāyikāḥ । antarāyaṁ na śaktiṣṭāḥ kṛtapuṇyasya kartu vai ।।
uv30#30.13: dharmaprītiḥ sukhaṁ śete viprasannena cetasā । āryapravedite dharme ramate paṇḍitaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
uv30#30.14: yeṣāṁ dharmarataṁ cittam anupādāya nirvṛtim ।smṛtyupasthānanirataṁ bodhyaṅgeṣu ca saptasu ।।
uv30#30.15: yeṣāṁ dharmarataṁ cittam anupādāya nirvṛtim । ṛddhipādarataṁ caiva mārge cāṣṭāṅgike ratam ।।
uv30#30.16: sukhaṁ te bhuñjate piṇḍaṁ dhārayanti ca cīvaram । sukhaṁ caṅkramaṇaṁ teṣāṁ parvateṣu guhāsu ca ।।
uv30#30.17: kṣemaprāptā hi sukhitā dṛṣṭadharmābhinirvṛtāḥ । sarvavairabhayātītās tīrṇā loke viṣaktikām ।।
uv30#30.18: sukho vivekas tuṣṭasya śrutadharmasya paśyataḥ । avyāvadhyaḥ sukhaṁ loke prāṇabhūteṣu saṁyamaḥ ।।
uv30#30.19: sukhaṁ virāgatā loke kāmānāṁ samatikramaḥ ।asmimānasya vinaya etad vai paramaṁ sukham ।।
uv30#30.20: sukhaṁ yāvaj jarā śīlaṁ sukhaṁ śraddhā pratiṣṭhitā । sukhaṁ cārtharatā vācā pāpasyākaraṇaṁ sukham ।।
uv30#30.21: sukhaṁ mātṛvyatā loke sukhaṁ caiva pitṛvyatā । sukhaṁ śrāmaṇyatā loke tathā brāhmaṇyatā sukhaṁ ।।
uv30#30.22: sukhaṁ buddhasya cotpādaḥ sukhaṁ dharmasya deśanā । sukhaṁ saṁghasya sāmagrī samagrāṇāṁ tapaḥ sukham ।।
uv30#30.23: śīlavantaḥ sukhaṁ dṛṣṭuṁ sukhaṁ dṛṣṭuṁ bahuśrutāḥ । arhantaś ca sukhaṁ dṛṣṭuṁ vipramuktapunarbhavāḥ ।।
uv30#30.24: sukhā nadī sūpatīrthā sukhaṁ dharmajino jinaḥ । prajñālābhaḥ sukho nityam asmimānakṣayaḥ sukham ।।
uv30#30.25: sukhaṁ darśanam āryāṇāṁ saṁvāso 'pi sadā sukham । adarśanena bālānāṁ nityam eva sukhī bhavet ।।
uv30#30.26: bālasaṁsargacārī hi dīrghādhvānaṁ praśocati । duḥkho bālair hi saṁvāso hy amitrair iva sarvaśaḥ । dhīrais tu sukhasaṁvāso jñātīnām iva saṁgamaḥ ।।
uv30#30.27: durlabhaḥ puruṣo jātyo nāsau sarvatra jāyate । yatrāsau jāyate vīras tat kulaṁ sukham edhate ।।
uv30#30.28: sarvathā vai sukhaṁ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ । yo na lipyate kāmebhir vipramukto nirāsravaḥ ।।
uv30#30.29: sarvā hy āśāstayaś chitvā vinīya hṛdayajvaram । upaśāntaḥ sukhaṁ śete śāntiṁ prāpyeha cetasaḥ ।।
uv30#30.30: mātrāsukhaparityāgād yaḥ paśyed vipulaṁ sukham । tyajen mātrāsukhaṁ dhīraḥ saṁpaśyaṁ vipulaṁ sukham ।।
uv30#30.31: yac ca kāmasukhaṁ loke yac cāpi divijaṁ sukham । tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaitat kalāṁ nārghati ṣoḍaśīm ।।
uv30#30.32: nikṣipya hi guruṁ bhāraṁ nādadyād bhāram eva tu । bhārādānaṁ paraṁ duḥkhaṁ bhāranikṣepaṇaṁ sukham ।।
uv30#30.33: sarvaṭṛṣṇāṁ viprahāya sarvasaṁyojanakṣayāt । sarvopadhiṁ parijñāya nāgacchanti punarbhavam ।।
uv30#30.34: artheṣu jāteṣu sukhaṁ sahāyāḥ puṇyaṁ sukhaṁ jīvitasaṁkṣayeṣu । tuṣṭiḥ sukhā yā tv itaretareṇa sarvasya duḥkhasya sukho nirodhaḥ ।।
uv30#30.35: ayoghanahatasyaiva jvalato jātavedasaḥ । anupūrvopaśāntasya yathā na jñāyate gatiḥ ।।
uv30#30.36: evaṁ samyagvimuktānāṁ kāmapaṅkaughatāriṇām । prajñāpayituṁ gatir nāsti prāptānām acalaṁ sukham ।।
uv30#30.37: yasyāntarato na santi kopā itthaṁbhāvagataṁ ca yo nivṛttaḥ । akhilaṁ taṁ sukhinaṁ sadā viśokaṁ devā nānubhavanti darśanena ।।
uv30#30.38: sukhaṁ hi yasyeha na kiñcanaṁ syāt svākhyātadharmasya bahuśrutasya । sakiñcanaṁ paśya vihanyamānaṁ janaṁ janeṣu pratibaddhacittam ।।
uv30#30.39: sukhaṁ hi yasyeha na kiñcanaṁ syāt svākhyātadharmasya bahuśrutasya । sakiñcanaṁ paśya vihanyamānaṁ janaṁ janeṣu pratibaddharūpam ।।
uv30#30.40: sukhino hi janā hy akiñcanā vedaguṇā hi janā hy akiñcanāḥ । sakiñcanaṁ paśya vihanyamānaṁ janaṁ janeṣu pratibaddhacittam ।।
uv30#30.41: sukhino hi janā hy akiñcanā vedaguṇā hi janā hy akiñcanāḥ । sakiñcanaṁ paśya vihanyamānaṁ janaṁ janeṣu pratibaddharūpam ।।
uv30#30.42: sarvaṁ paravaśaṁ duḥkhaṁ sarvam ātmavaśaṁ sukham । sādhāraṇe vihanyante yogā hi duratikramāḥ ।।
uv30#30.43: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo hy utsukeṣu tv anutsukāḥ । utsukeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy anutsukāḥ ।।
uv30#30.44: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo yeṣāṁ no nāsti kiñcanam । mithilāyāṁ dahyamānāyāṁ na no dahyati kiñcanam ।।
uv30#30.45: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo hy ātureṣu tv anāturāḥ । ātureṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy anāturāḥ ।।
uv30#30.46: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo hiṁsakeṣu tv ahiṁsakāḥ । hiṁsakeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy ahiṁsakāḥ ।।
uv30#30.47: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo vairikeṣu tv avairikāḥ । vairikeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy avairikāḥ ।।
uv30#30.48: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo heṭhakeṣu tv aheṭhakāḥ । heṭhakeṣu manuṣyeṣu viharāmo hy aheṭhakāḥ ।।
uv30#30.49: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo yeṣāṁ no nāsti kiñcanam । prītibhakṣā bhaviṣyāmo devā hy ābhasvarā yathā ।।
uv30#30.50: susukhaṁ bata jīvāmo yeṣāṁ no nāsti kiñcanam । prītibhakṣā bhaviṣyāmo satkāyenopaniḥśritāḥ ।।
uv30#30.51: grāme araṇye sukhaduḥkhaspṛṣṭo naivātmano no parato dadhāti । sparśāḥ spṛśanti hy upadhiṁ pratītya niraupadhiṁ kiṁ sparśāḥ spṛśeyuḥ ।।
uv30#30.52: sāpatrapāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti na kāmahetor lapayanti santaḥ । spṛṣṭā hi duḥkena tathā sukhena noccāvacāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti ।।
uv2#2.1: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṁ saṁkalpāt kāma jāyase । na tvāṁ saṁkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi ।।
uv2#2.2: kāmebhyo jāyate śokaḥ kāmebhyo jāyate bhayam । kāmebhyo vipramuktānāṁ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam ।।
uv2#2.3: ratibhyo jāyate śoko ratibhyo jāyate bhayam । ratibhyo vipramuktānāṁ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam ।।
uv2#2.4: madhurāgrā vipāke tu kaṭukā hy abhinanditāḥ । kāmā dahanti vai bālān ulkevāmuñcataḥ karam ।।
uv2#2.5: na tad dṛḍhaṁ bandhanam āhur āryā yad āyasaṁ dāravaṁ balbajaṁ vā । saṁraktacittasya hi mandabuddheḥ putreṣu dāreṣu ca yā avekṣā ।।
uv2#2.6: etad dṛḍhaṁ bandhanam āhur āryāḥ samantataḥ susthiraṁ duṣpramokṣam । etad api cchitvā tu parivrajanti hy anapekṣiṇaḥ kāmasukhaṁ prahāya ।।
uv2#2.7: na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṁkalparāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ । tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathaiva loke athātra dhīrā vinayanti cchandam ।।
uv2#2.8: na santi nityā manujeṣu kāmāḥ santi tv anityāḥ kāmino yatra baddhāḥ । tāṁs tu prahāya hy apunarbhavāya hy anāgataṁ mṛtyudheyaṁ vadāmi ।।
uv2#2.9: chandajāto hy avasrāvī manasānāvilo bhavet । kāmeṣu tv apratibaddhacitta ūrdvasroto nirucyate ।।
uv2#2.10: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṁ stokaṁ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe । karmāro rajatasyaiva nirdhamen malam ātmanaḥ ।।
uv2#2.11: rathakāra iva carmaṇaḥ parikartann upānaham । yad yaj jahāti kāmānāṁ tat tat saṁpadyate sukham ।।
uv2#2.12: sarvaṁ cet sukham iccheta sarvakāmāṁ parityajet । sarvakāmaparityāgī hy atyantaṁ sukham edhate ।।
uv2#2.13: yāvat kāmān anusaraṁ na tṛptiṁ manaso 'dhyagāt ।. tato nivṛttiṁ pratipaśyamānās te vai tṛptāḥ prajñayā ye sutṛptāḥ ।।
uv2#2.14: śreyasī prajñayā tṛptir na hi kāmair vitṛpyate । prajñayā puruṣaṁ tṛptaṁ tṛṣṇā na kurute vaśam ।।
uv2#2.15: gṛddhā hi kāmeṣu narāḥ pramattā hy adharme bata te ratāḥ । antarāyaṁ na te paśyanty alpake jīvite sati ।।
uv2#2.16: durmedhasaṁ hanti bhogo na tv ihātmagaveṣiṇam । durmedhā bhogatṛṣnābhir hanty ātmānam atho parān ।।
uv2#2.17: na karṣāpaṇavarṣeṇa tṛptiḥ kāmair hi vidyate । alpāsvādasukhāḥ kāṁā iti vijñāya paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv2#2.18: api divyeṣu kāmeṣu sa ratiṁ nādhigacchati । tṛṣṇākṣayarato bhavati buddhānāṁ śrāvakaḥ sadā ।।
uv2#2.19: parvato 'pi suvarṇasya samo himavatā bhavet । vittaṁ taṁ nālam ekasya etaj jñātvā samaṁ caret ।।
uv2#2.20: duḥkaṁ hi yo veda yato nidānaṁ kāmeṣu jantu sa kathaṁ rameta । upadhiṁ hi loke śalyam iti matvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet ।।
uv7#7.1: kāyapradoṣaṁ rakṣeta syāt kāyena susaṁvṛtaḥ । kāyaduścaritaṁ hitvā kāyena sukṛtaṁ caret ।।
uv7#7.2: vācaḥ pradoṣaṁ rakṣeta vacasā saṁvṛto bhavet । vāco duścaritaṁ hitvā vācā sucaritaṁ caret ।।
uv7#7.3: manaḥpradoṣaṁ rakṣeta manasā saṁvṛto bhavet । manoduścaritaṁ hitvā manaḥsucaritaṁ caret ।।
uv7#7.4: kāyaduścaritaṁ hitvā vacoduścaritāni ca । manoduścaritaṁ hitvā yac cānyad doṣasaṁhitaṁ ।।
uv7#7.5: kāyena kuśalaṁ kuryād vacasā kuśalaṁ bahu । manasā kuśalaṁ kuryād apramāṇaṁ niraupadhim ।।
uv7#7.6: kāyena kuśalaṁ kṛtvā vacasā cetasāpi ca । iha cātha paratrāsau sukhaṁ samadhigacchati ।।
uv7#7.7: ahiṁsakā vai munayo nityaṁ kāyena saṁvṛtāḥ । te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati ।।
uv7#7.8: ahiṁsakā vai munayo nityaṁ vācā susaṁvṛtāḥ । te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati ।।
uv7#7.9: ahiṁsakā vai munayo manasā nityasaṁvṛtāḥ । te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati ।।
uv7#7.10: kāyena saṁvṛtā dhīrā dhīrā vācā susaṁvṛtāḥ । manasā saṁvṛtā dhīrā dhīrāḥ sarvatra saṁvṛtāḥ । te yānti hy acyutaṁ sthānaṁ yatra gatvā na śocati ।।
uv7#7.11: kāyena saṁvaraḥ sādhu sādhu vācā ca saṁvaraḥ । manasā saṁvaraḥ sādhu sādhu sarvatra saṁvaraḥ । sarvatra saṁvṛto bhikṣuḥ sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।।
uv7#7.12: vācānurakṣī manasā susaṁvṛtaḥ kāyena caivākuśalaṁ na kuryāt ।etāṁ śubhāṁ karmapathāṁ viśodhayann ārādhayen mārgam ṛṣipraveditam ।।
uv26#26.1: kurmo yathāṅgāni svake kapāle samādadhītātmavitarkitāni । aniḥśrito hy anyam aheṭhayānaḥ parinirvṛto nāpavadeta kaṁ cit ।।
uv26#26.2: kṣāntiḥ paramaṁ tapas titīkṣā nirvāṇaṁ paramaṁ vadanti buddhāḥ । na hi pravrajitaḥ paropatāpī śramaṇo bhavati paraṁ viheṭhayaṁ vai ।।
uv26#26.3: mā kaṁ cit paruṣaṁ brūthaḥ proktāḥ prativadanti tam ।duḥkhā hi saṁrambhakathāḥ pratidaṇḍaṁ spṛśanti hi ।।
uv26#26.4: yadīrayasi hātmānaṁ kaṁsīvopahatā sadā । jātimaraṇasaṁsāraṁ ciraṁ hy anubhaviṣyasi ।।
uv26#26.5: na tv īrayasi hātmānaṁ kaṁsir nopahatā yathā । eṣa prāpto 'si nirvāṇaṁ saṁrambhas te na vidyate ।।
uv26#26.6: ārogyaparamā lābhā saṁtuṣṭiparamaṁ dhanam । viśvāsaparamaṁ mitraṁ nirvāṇaparamaṁ sukham ।।
uv26#26.7: kṣudhā parama rogāṇāṁ saṁskārā duḥkham eva tu । etaj jñātvā yathābhūtaṁ nirvāṇaparamo bhavet ।।
uv26#26.8: alpakāḥ sugatiṁ yānti bahavo yānti durgatim । etaj jñātvā yathābhūtaṁ nirvāṇaparamo bhavet ।।
uv26#26.9: sahetuṁ sugatiṁ yānti sahetuṁ yānti durgatim । sahetuṁ parinirvānti hy evam etat sahetukam ।।
uv26#26.10: gatir mṛgāṇāṁ pravaṇam ākāśaṁ pakṣiṇāṁ gatiḥ । dharmo gatir vibhāgīnāṁ nirvāṇaṁ tv arhatāṁ gatiḥ ।।
uv26#26.11: na hīdaṁ hīnavīryeṇa mandenāpy avijānatā । nirvāṇaṁ śakyam adhigantuṁ sarvagranthapradālanam ।।
uv26#26.12: siñca bhikṣor imāṁ nāvaṁ siktā laghvī bhaviṣyati । hitvā rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi ।।
uv26#26.13: abhūt pūrve tato nābhūn nābhūt pūrve tato hy abhūt ।na cābhūn na bhaviṣyati na vāpy etarhi vidyate ।।
uv26#26.14: durdṛśaṁ satyam acalaṁ sudṛśaṁ pratividhyataḥ ।tṛṣṇākṣayaṁ paśyato hi duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.15: chitvā tṛṣṇāṁ praśāmyeha rajaḥ sarvaṁ samāhitaḥ । viśoṣayitvā saritāṁ duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.16: bhitvā kāyaṁ ca saṁjñāṁ ca vedanāṁ vyupaśāmya ca । vijñānāstagamaṁ labdhvā duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.17: dṛṣṭe tu dṛṣṭamātreṇa śrute ca śrutamātratā । mate tathaiva vijñāte duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.18: ene mene tathā dapphe daḍapphe ceti budhyataḥ । sarvasmād viratiḥ pāpād duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.19: māśā tuṣā saṁśamā ca sarvatra viraḍī tathā । sarvasmād viratiḥ pāpād duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.20: aniḥśritasyācalitaṁ prasrabdhiś ceha vidyate । na gatir na cyutiś caiva duḥkhasyānto nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.21: ajāte sati jātasya vaden niḥsaraṇaṁ sadā । asaṁskṛtaṁ ca saṁpaśyaṁ saṁskṛtāt parimucyate ।।
uv26#26.22: jātaṁ bhūtaṁ samutpannaṁ kṛtaṁ saṁskṛtam adhruvam । jarāmaraṇasaṁghātaṁ moṣadharmapralopanam ।āhāranetrīprabhavaṁ nālaṁ tad abhinanditum ।।
uv26#26.23: tasya niḥsaraṇaṁ śāntam atarkāvacaraṁ padam । nirodho duḥkhadharmāṇāṁ saṁskāropaśamaṁ sukham ।।
uv26#26.24: abhijānāmy ahaṁ sthānaṁ yatra bhūtaṁ na vidyate । nākāśaṁ na ca vijñānaṁ na sūryaś candramā na ca ।।
uv26#26.25: naivāgatir na ca gatir nopapattiś cyutir na ca । apratiṣṭham anālambaṁ duḥkhāntaḥ sa nirucyate ।।
uv26#26.26: yatra nāpo na pṛthivī tejo vāyur na gāhate । na tatra śuklā dyotanti tamas tatra na vidyate ।।
uv26#26.27: na tatra candramā bhāti nādityo vai prakāśyate । yathā tv ihātmanā vetti munir mauneyam ātmanaḥ । atha rūpād arūpāc ca sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।।
uv26#26.28: niṣṭhāgato hy asaṁtrāsī na vikanthī na kaukṛtiḥ । ācchettā bhavaśalyānām antimo 'sya samucchrayaḥ ।।
uv26#26.29: eṣā hi paramā niṣṭhā śāntaṁ padam anuttaram । kṣayaḥ sarvanimittānāṁ pradānapadam acyutam ।।
uv26#26.30: tulyam atulyaṁ ca saṁbhavaṁ bhavasaṁskāram avāsṛjan muniḥ । ādhyātmarataḥ samāhito hy abhinat kośam ivāṇḍasaṁbhavam ।।
uv26#26.31: jayate dānaṁ dharmadānaṁ ca sarvaṁ jayate ratiṁ dharmaratiṁś ca sarvām । jayate balaṁ kṣāntibalaṁ ca sarvaṁ jayate sukhaṁ sarvaṭṛṣānirodhaḥ ।। [i] sarvaṁ dānaṁ dharmadānaṁ jināti sarvāṁ ratiṁ dharmaratiṁ jināti । sarvaṁ balaṁ kṣāntibalaṁ jināti tṛṣṇākṣayaḥ sarvasukhaṁ jināti ।। [ii]
uv18#18.1: ka imāṁ pṛthivīṁ vijeṣyate yamalokaṁ ca tathā sadevakam । ko dharmapadaṁ sudeśitaṁ kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate ।।
uv18#18.2: śaikṣaḥ pṛthivīṁ vijeṣyate yamalokaṁ ca tathā sadevakam । sa hi dharmapadaṁ sudeśitaṁ kuśalaḥ puṣpam iva praceṣyate ।।
uv18#18.3: vanaṁ chindata mā vṛkṣaṁ vanād vai jāyate bhayam । chitvā vanaṁ samūlaṁ tu nirvaṇā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ ।।
uv18#18.4: na chidyate yāvatā vanaṁ hy anumātram api narasya bandhuṣu । pratibaddhamanāḥ sa tatra vai vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka iva mātaram ।।
uv18#18.5: ucchindi hi sneham ātmanaḥ padmaṁ śāradakaṁ yathodakāt । śāntimārgam eva bṛṁhayen nirvāṇaṁ sugatena deśitam ।।
uv18#18.6: yathāpi ruciraṁ puṣpaṁ varṇavat syād agandhavat । evaṁ subhāṣitā vācā niṣphalāsāv akurvataḥ ।।
uv18#18.7: yathāpi ruciraṁ puṣpaṁ varṇavat syād sugandhavat । evaṁ subhāṣitā vācā saphalā bhavati kurvataḥ ।।
uv18#18.8: yathāpi bhramaraḥ puṣpād varṇagandhāv aheṭhayan । paraiti rasam ādāya tathā grāmāṁ muniś caret ।।
uv18#18.9: na pareṣāṁ vilomāni na pareṣāṁ kṛtākṛtam । ātmanas tu samīkṣeta samāni viṣamāni ca ।।
uv18#18.10: yathāpi puṣparāśibhyaḥ kuryān mālāguṇāṁ bahūn । evaṁ jātena martyena kartavyaṁ kuśalaṁ bahu ।।
uv18#18.11: varṣāsu hi yathā puṣpaṁ vaguro vipramuñcati । evaṁ rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca vipramuñcata bhikṣavaḥ ।।
uv18#18.12: yathā saṁkārukūṭe tu vyujjhite hi mahāpathe । padmaṁ tatra tu jāyeta śucigandhi manoramam ।।
uv18#18.13: evaṁ saṁkārabhūte 'sminn andhabhūte pṛthagjane । prajñayā vyatirocante samyaksaṁbuddhaśrāvakāḥ ।।
uv18#18.14: puṣpāṇy eva pracinvantaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram । suptaṁ grāmaṁ mahaughaiva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati ।।
uv18#18.15: puṣpāṇy eva pracinvantaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram । atṛptam eva kāmeṣu tv antakaḥ kurute vaśam ।।
uv18#18.16: puṣpāṇy eva pracinvantaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram । anutpanneṣu bhogeṣu tv antakaḥ kurute vaśam ।।
uv18#18.17: kumbhopamaṁ kāyam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva । chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet ।।
uv18#18.18: phenopamaṁ kāyam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva । chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet ।।
uv18#18.19: kumbhopamaṁ lokam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva । chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet ।।
uv18#18.20: phenopamaṁ lokam imaṁ viditvā marīcidharmaṁ paribudhya caiva । chitveha mārasya tu puṣpakāṇi tv adarśanaṁ mṛtyurājasya gacchet ।।
uv18#18.21: yo nādhyagamad bhaveṣu sāraṁ buddhvā puṣpam udumbarasya yadvat । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv18#18.21A: yo rāgam udācchinatty aśeṣaṁ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṁ vigāhya । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv18#18.21B: yo dveṣam udācchinatty aśeṣaṁ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṁ vigāhya । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv18#18.21C: yo moham udācchinatty aśeṣaṁ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṁ vigāhya । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv18#18.21D: yo mānam udācchinatty aśeṣaṁ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṁ vigāhya । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv18#18.21E: yo lobham udācchinatty aśeṣaṁ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṁ vigāhya । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv18#18.21F: tṛṣṇāṁ ya udācchinatty aśeṣaṁ bisapuṣpam iva jaleruhaṁ vigāhya । sa tu bhikṣur idaṁ jahāty apāraṁ hy urago jīrṇam iva tvacaṁ purāṇam ।।
uv21#21.1: sarvābhibhūḥ sarvavid eva cāsmi sarvaiś ca dharmaiḥ satataṁ na liptaḥ । sarvaṁjahaḥ sarvabhayād vimuktaḥ svayaṁ hy abhijñāya kam uddiśeyam ।।
uv21#21.2: kam uddiśeyaṁ tv asamo hy atulyaḥ svayaṁ pravaktā hy adhigamya bodhim । tathāgato devamanuṣyaśāstā sarvajñatāṁ prāpya balair upetaḥ ।।
uv21#21.3: ahaṁ hi lokeṣv arahann ahaṁ lokeṣv anuttaraḥ । sadevakeṣu lokeṣu cāhaṁ mārābhibhūr jinaḥ ।।
uv21#21.4: ācāryo me na vai kaś cit sadṛśaś ca na vidyate ।eko 'smiṁ loke saṁbuddhaḥ prāptaḥ saṁbodhim uttamām ।।
uv21#21.5: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā hy āsravakṣayam । jitā me pāpakā dharmās tato 'ham upagā jinaḥ ।।
uv21#21.6: bārāṇasīṁ gamiṣyāmi haniṣye 'mṛtadundubhim ।dharmacakraṁ pravartayiṣye lokeṣv aprativartitam ।।
uv21#21.7: na hi santaḥ prakāśyante viditvā lokaparyāyam ।ādeśayanto virajaḥ padaṁ śāntamanīṣiṇaḥ ।।
uv21#21.8: nadantīha mahāvīrāḥ saddharmeṇa tathāgatāḥ । dharmeṇa nadamānānāṁ ke tv asūyed vijānakāḥ ।।
uv21#21.9: ye dhyānaprasṛtā dhīrā naiṣkramyopaśame ratāḥ । devāpi spṛhayanty eṣāṁ buddhānāṁ śrīmatāṁ sadā ।।
uv21#21.10: teṣāṁ devā manuṣyāś ca saṁbuddhānāṁ yaśasvinām । spṛhayanty āśubuddhīnāṁ śarīrāntimadhāriṇām ।।
uv21#21.11: ye cābhyatītāḥ saṁbuddhā ye ca buddhā hy anāgatāḥ । yaś cāpy etarhi saṁbuddho bahūnāṁ śokanāśakaḥ ।।
uv21#21.12: sarve saddharmaguravo vyāhārṣu viharanti ca । athāpi vihariṣyanti eṣā buddheṣu dharmatā ।।
uv21#21.13: tasmād ihātmakāmena māhātmyam abhikāṅkṣatā । saddharmo gurukartavyaḥ smaratā buddhaśāsanam ।।
uv21#21.14: na śraddhāsyanti vai ye tu narā buddhasya śāsanam । vyasanaṁ te gamiṣyanti vaṇijo rākṣasīṣv iva ।।
uv21#21.15: śraddhāsyanti tu ye nityaṁ narā buddhasya śāsanam । svastinā te gamiṣyanti vālāhenaiva vāṇijāḥ ।।
uv21#21.16: tathāgataṁ buddham iha svayaṁbhuvaṁdvau vai vitarkau bahulaṁ samudācarete । kṣemas tathaiva pravivekayuktas tamonudaṁ pāragataṁ maharṣim ।।
uv21#21.17: prāptaḥ sa cāryo vaśitām aśeṣāṁ viṣvottaraḥ sarvabhayād vimuktaḥ । tṛṣṇāprahīṇo vimalo nirāśaś cālokayaṁ lokahitāya satvān ।।
uv21#21.18: śaile yathā parvatamūrdhani sthito yathaiva paśyej janatāṁ samantāt । tathā hy asau dharmamayaṁ sumedhāḥ prāsādam āruhya samantacakṣuḥ । śokābhibhūtāṁ janatām aśoko 'drākṣīd imāṁ jātijarābhibhūtām ।।
uv23#23.1: subhāṣitasya śikṣeta śramaṇopāsanasya ca । ekāsanasya ca rahaś cittavyupaśamasya ca ।।
uv23#23.2: ekāsanaṁ tv ekaśayyām ekacaryām atandritaḥ । ramayec caikam ātmānaṁ vaneṣv ekaḥ sadā vaset ।।
uv23#23.3: yaḥ sahasraṁ sahasrāṇāṁ saṁgrāme dviṣatāṁ jayet । yaś cātmānaṁ jayed ekaṁ saṁgrāmo durjayaḥ sa vai ।।
uv23#23.4: ātmā hy asya jitaḥ śreyāṁ yac ceyam itarāḥ prajāḥ । ātmadāntasya puruṣasya nityaṁ saṁvṛtacāriṇaḥ ।।
uv23#23.5: na devā nāpi gandharvā na māro brāhmaṇā saha । jitasyāpajitaṁ kuryus tathā prājñasya bhikṣuṇaḥ ।।
uv23#23.7: ātmānam eva prathamaṁ pratirūpe niveśayet । tato 'nyam anuśāsīta na kliśyeta hi paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.8: ātmānaṁ hi tathā kuryāc chāsītānyaṁ yathā svayam । sudānto bata me nityam ātmā sa hi sudurdamaḥ ।।
uv23#23.9: ātmānaṁ hi tathā kuryāc chāsītānyaṁ yathā svayam । ātmā dānto mayā nityam ātmadānto hi paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.10: ātmano 'rthaṁ parārthena bahunāpi na hāpayet । ātmārthaṁ paramaṁ jñātvā svakārthaparamo bhavet ।।
uv23#23.11: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena nāthaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.12: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena arthaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.13: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena dharmaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.14: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena yaśo labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.15: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena kīrtiṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.16: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena sukhāṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.17: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.18: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena ciraṁ svargeṣu modate ।।
uv23#23.19: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena ciraṁ svarge pratiṣṭhati ।।
uv23#23.20: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena prajñāṁ labhati paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv23#23.21: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena jñātimadhye virocate ।।
uv23#23.22: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena śokamadhye na śocati ।।
uv23#23.23: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvaṁ chindati bandhanam ।।
uv23#23.24: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvās tyajati durgatīḥ ।।
uv23#23.25: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।।
uv23#23.26: ātmā tv ihātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet । ātmanā hi sudāntena nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।।
uv4#4.1: apramādo hy amṛtapadaṁ pramādo mṛtyunaḥ padam ।apramattā na mriyante ye pramattāḥ sadā mṛtāḥ ।।
uv4#4.2: etāṁ viśeṣatāṁ jñātvā hy apramādasya paṇḍitaḥ । apramādaṁ pramudyeta nityam āryaḥ svagocaram ।।
uv4#4.3: apramattāḥ sātatikā nityaṁ dṛḍhaparākramāḥ ।spṛśanti dhīrā nirvāṇaṁ yogakṣemam anuttaram ।।
uv4#4.4: pramādam apramādena yadā nudati paṇḍitaḥ । prajñāprāsādam āruhya tv aśokaḥ śokinīṁ prajām । parvatasthaiva bhūmisthāṁ dhīro bālān avekṣate ।।
uv4#4.5: utthānenāpramādena saṁyamena damena ca । dvīpaṁ karoti medhāvī tam ogho nābhimardati ।।
uv4#4.6: utthānavataḥ smṛtātmanaḥ śubhacittasya niśāmyacāriṇaḥ । saṁyatasya hi dharmajīvino hy apramattasya yaśo 'bhivardhate ।।
uv4#4.7: adhicetasi mā pramadyata pratataṁ maunapadeṣu śikṣata । śokā na bhavanti tāyino hy upaśāntasya sadā smṛtātmanaḥ ।।
uv4#4.8: hīnāṁ dharmāṁ na seveta pramādena na saṁvaset । mithyādṛṣṭiṁ na roceta na bhavel lokavardhanaḥ ।।
uv4#4.9: samyagdṛṣṭir adhīmātrā laukikī yasya vidyate । api jātisahasrāṇi nāsau gacchati durgatim ।।
uv4#4.10: pramādam anuvartante bālā durmedhaso janāḥ । apramādaṁ tu medhāvī dhanaṁ śreṣṭhīva rakṣati ।।
uv4#4.11: pramādam anuvartante bālā durmedhaso janāḥ । apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy āsravakṣayam ।।
uv4#4.12: pramādaṁ nānuyujyeta na kāmaratisaṁstavam । apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy acalaṁ sukham ।।
uv4#4.13: nāyaṁ pramādakālaḥ syād aprāpte hy āsravakṣaye । māraḥ pramattam anveti siṁhaṁ vā mṛgramātṛkā ।।
uv4#4.14: sthānāni catvāri naraḥ pramatta āpadyate yaḥ paradārasevī । apuṇyalābhaṁ hy anikāmaśayyāṁ nindāṁ tṛtīyaṁ narakaṁ caturtham ।।
uv4#4.15: apuṇyalābhaṁ ca gatiṁ ca pāpikāṁ bhītasya bhītābhir athālpikāṁ ratim ।nindāṁ ca paśyaṁ nṛpateś ca daṇḍaṁ parasya dārāṇi vivarjayeta ।। [i] apuṇyalābhaś ca gatiś ca pāpikā bhītasya bhītābhir athālpikā ratiḥ ।rājā ca daṇḍaṁ gurukaṁ dadāti kāyasya bhedād narakeṣu pacyate ।। [ii]
uv4#4.16: pratiyatyeva tat kuryād yaj jāned dhitam ātmanaḥ । na śākaṭikacintābhir mandaṁ dhīraḥ parākramet ।।
uv4#4.17: yathā śākaṭiko mārgaṁ samaṁ hitvā mahāpatham । viṣamaṁ mārgam āgamya cchinnākṣaḥ śocate bhṛśam ।।
uv4#4.18: evaṁ dharmād apakramya hy adharmam anuvartya ca । bālo mṛtyuvaśaṁ prāptac chinnākṣa iva śocate ।।
uv4#4.19: yat kṛtyaṁ tad apaviddham akṛtyaṁ kriyate punaḥ । uddhatānāṁ pramattānāṁ teṣāṁ vardhanti āsravāḥ । āsravās teṣu vardhante ārāt te hy āsravakṣayāt ।।
uv4#4.20: yeṣāṁ tu susamārabdhā nityaṁ kāyagatā smṛtiḥ । akṛtyaṁ te na kurvanti kṛtye sātatyakāriṇaḥ । smṛtānāṁ saṁprajānānām astaṁ gacchanti āsravāḥ ।।
uv4#4.21: na tāvatā dharmadharo yāvatā bahu bhāṣate । yas tv ihālpam api śrutvā dharmaṁ kāyena vai spṛśet । sa vai dharmadharo bhavati yo dharme na pramādyate ।।
uv4#4.22: subahv apīha sahitaṁ bhāṣamāṇo na tatkaro bhavati naraḥ pramattaḥ । gopaiva gāḥ saṁgaṇayaṁ pareṣāṁ na bhāgavāṁ cchrāmaṇyārthasya bhavati ।।
uv4#4.23: alpam api cet sahitaṁ bhāṣamāṇo dharmasya bhavati hy anudharmacārī । rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tathaiva mohaṁ prahāya bhāgī śrāmaṇyārthasya bhavati ।।
uv4#4.24: apramādaṁ praśaṁsanti pramādo garhitaḥ sadā । apramādena maghavāṁ devānāṁ śreṣṭhatāṁ gataḥ ।।
uv4#4.25: apramādaṁ praśaṁsanti sadā kṛtyeṣu paṇḍitāḥ । apramatto hy ubhāv arthāv atigṛhṇāti paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv4#4.26: dṛṣṭadhārmika eko 'rthas tathānyaḥ sāmparāyikaḥ । arthābhisamayād dhīraḥ paṇḍito hi nirucyate ।।
uv4#4.27: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ । durgād uddharate tmānaṁ paṅkasannaiva kuñjaraḥ ।।
uv4#4.28: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ । dhunāti pāpakāṁ dharmāṁ patrāṇīva hi mārutaḥ ।।
uv4#4.29: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ । saṁyojanam aṇusthūlaṁ dahann agnir iva gacchati ।।
uv4#4.30: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ । spṛśati hy anupūrveṇa sarvasaṁyojanakṣayam ।।
uv4#4.31: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ । pratividhyate padaṁ śāntaṁ saṁskāropaśamaṁ sukham ।।
uv4#4.32: apramādarato bhikṣuḥ pramāde bhayadarśakaḥ । abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।।
uv4#4.33: uttiṣṭata vyāyamata dṛḍhaṁ śikṣata śāntaye । asmṛtiś ca pramādaś caivānutthānam asaṁyamaḥ ।।
uv4#4.34: nidrā tandrīr anāyoga ete śikṣāntarāyikāḥ । tad aṅgaṁ pratibudhyadhvaṁ smṛtir māntaradhīyata ।।
uv4#4.35: uttiṣṭhen na pramādyeta dharmaṁ sucaritaṁ caret । dharmacārī sukhaṁ śete hy asmiṁ loke paratra ca ।।
uv4#4.36: apramādaratā bhavata suśīlā bhavata bhikṣavaḥ । susamāhitasaṁkalpāḥ svacittam anurakṣata ।।
uv4#4.37: ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkramadhvaṁ yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane । dhunidhvaṁ mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṁ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ ।।
uv4#4.38: yo hy asmiṁ dharmavinaye tv apramatto bhaviṣyati । prahāya jātisaṁsāraṁ duḥkhasyāntaṁ sa yāsyati ।।
uv29#29.1: avabhāsati tāvat sa kṛmir yāvan nodayate divākaraḥ । vairocanĕ tūdgate bhṛśaṁ śvāvo bhavati na cāvabhāsate ।।
uv29#29.2: evaṁ bhāsitam āsi tārkitair yāvan nodayate tathāgataḥ ।buddhapratibhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsati nāsya śrāvakaḥ ।।
uv29#29.3: asāre sāramatayaḥ sāre cāsārasaṁjñinaḥ । te sāraṁ nādhigacchanti mithyāsaṁkalpagocarāḥ ।।
uv29#29.4: sāraṁ tu sārato jñātvā hy asāraṁ cāpy asārataḥ । te sāram adhigacchanti samyaksaṁkalpagocarāḥ ।।
uv29#29.5: upātidhāvanti hi sārabuddhyā navaṁ navaṁ bandhanam ādadantaḥ । patanti hi dyotam ivāndhakārād dṛṣṭe śrute caiva niviṣṭacittāḥ ।।
uv29#29.6: kāṅkṣā hi yā syād iha vā pṛthag vā ihavedikā vā paravedikā vā । tāṁ dhyāyino viprajahanti sarvā hy ātāpino brahmacaryaṁ carantaḥ ।।
uv29#29.7: aniṣkaṣāyaḥ kāṣāyaṁ yo vastraṁ paridhāsyati । apetadamasauratyo nāsau kāṣāyam arhati ।।
uv29#29.8: yas tu vāntakaṣāyaḥ syāc chīleṣu susamāhitaḥ । upetadamasauratyaḥ sa vai kāṣāyam arhati ।।
uv29#29.9: yasya doṣāḥ samucchinnās tālamastakavad dhatāḥ ।sa vāntadoṣo medhāvī sādhurūpo nirucyate ।।
uv29#29.10: na nāmarūpamātreṇa varṇapuṣkalayā na ca । sādhurūpo naro bhavati māyāvī matsarī śaṭhaḥ ।।
uv29#29.11: na varṇarūpeṇa naro hi sarvo vijñāyate netvaradarśanena । susaṁvṛtānām iha vyañjanena tv asaṁvṛtā lokam imaṁ caranti ।।
uv29#29.12: pratirūpakaṁ dhūpitakarṇikā vā lohārdhamāṣa iva hiraṇyacchannaḥ । caranti haike parivāravantas tv antar hy aśuddhā bahi śobhamānāḥ ।।
uv29#29.13: middhī ca yo bhavati mahāgrasaś ca rātriṁ divaṁ saṁparivartaśāyī । mahāvarāhaiva nivāpapuṣṭaḥ punaḥ punar mandam upaiti garbham ।।
uv29#29.14: manujasya sadā smṛtīmato labdhvā bhojanamātrajānataḥ । tanukāsya bhavanti vedanāḥ śanakair jīryati āyuḥ pālayam ।।
uv29#29.15: śubhānudarśinaṁ nityam indriyaiś cāpy asaṁvṛtam । bhojane cāpy amātrajñaṁ hīnaṁ jāgarikāsu ca । taṁ vai prasahate rāgo vāto vṛkṣam ivābalam ।। [i] śubhānupaśyī viharann indriyair hi asaṁvṛtaḥ । bhojane cāpy amātrajñaḥ kusīdo hīnavīryavān । taṁ vai prasahate rāgo vāto vṛkṣam ivābalam ।। [ii]

uv29#29.17: ramaṇīyāny araṇyāni na cātra ramate janaḥ । vītarāgātra raṁsyante na tu kāmagaveṣiṇaḥ ।।
uv29#29.18: grāme vā yadi vāraṇye nimne vā yadi vā sthale । yatrārhanto viharanti te deśā ramaṇīyakāḥ ।।
uv29#29.19: dūrāt santaḥ prakāśyante himavān iva parvataḥ । asanto na prakāśyante rātrikṣiptāḥ śarā yathā ।।
uv29#29.20: sadbhir eva sahāsīta paṇḍitair arthacintakaiḥ ।arthaṁ mahāntaṁ gambhīraṁ prajñayā pratividhyate ।।
uv29#29.21: ahaṁ nāga iva saṁgrāme cāpād utpatitāṁ śarān । ativākyaṁ titīkṣāmi duḥśīlo hi mahājanaḥ ।।
uv29#29.22: bhave cāhaṁ bhayaṁ dṛṣṭvā bhūyaś ca vibhavaṁ bhave ।tasmād bhavaṁ nābhinande nandī ca vibhavena me ।।
uv29#29.23: aśraddhaś cākṛtajñaś ca saṁdhicchettā ca yo naraḥ ।hatāvakāśo vāntāśaḥ sa vai tūttamapūruṣaḥ ।।
uv29#29.24: mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hatvā rājānaṁ dvau ca śrotriyau । rāṣṭraṁ sānucaraṁ hatvā anigho yāti brāhmaṇaḥ ।।

uv29#29.33: alpakās te manuṣyeṣu ye janāḥ pāragāminaḥ ।atheyam itarāḥ prajās tīram evānudhāvati ।।
uv29#29.34: ye tarhi samyag ākhyāte dharme dharmānudarśinaḥ । te janāḥ pāram eṣyanti mṛtyudheyasya sarvaśaḥ ।।
uv29#29.35: gatādhvano viśokasya vipramuktasya tāyinaḥ । sarvagranthaprahīṇasya paridāgho na vidyate ।।
uv29#29.36: uttīrṇaḥ sabhayo mārgaḥ pātālaḥ parivarjitaḥ । mukto yogais tathā granthaiḥ sarvaṁ rāgaviṣaṁ hatam ।।
uv29#29.37: nāsti kāmasamo hy ogho nāsti doṣasamo grahaḥ । nāsti mohasamaṁ jālaṁ nāsti tṛṣṇāsamā nadī
uv29#29.38: ākāśe tu padaṁ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyakaḥ । prapañcābhiratā bālā niṣprapañcās tathāgatāḥ ।।
uv29#29.39: yogaiḥ samuhyate bālo yogāṁ nudati paṇḍitaḥ । yogāṁ praṇudya medhāvī ye divyā ye ca mānusāḥ । sarvayogāṁ praṇudyeha sarvaduḥkhāṭ pramucyate ।।
uv29#29.40: yogād bhavaḥ prabhavati viyogād bhavasaṁkṣayaḥ । etad dvaidhāpathaṁ jñātvā bhavāya vibhavāya ca । tatra śikṣeta medhāvī yatra yogān atikramet ।।
uv29#29.41: akṛtaṁ kukṛtāc chreyaḥ paścāt tapati duṣkṛtam । śocate duṣkṛtaṁ kṛtvā śocate durgatiṁ gataḥ ।।
uv29#29.42: kṛtaṁ tu sukṛtaṁ śreyo yat kṛtvā nānutapyate । nandate sukṛtaṁ kṛtvā nandate sugatiṁ gataḥ
uv29#29.43: nābhāṣamāṇā jñāyante miśrā bālair hi paṇḍitāḥ । jñāyante bhāṣamāṇās tu deṣayanto 'rajaḥ padam ।।
uv29#29.44: bhāṣayed dyotayed dharmam ucchrayed ṛṣiṇāṁ dhvajam । subhāṣitadhvajā nityam ṛṣayor dharmagauravāḥ ।।
uv29#29.45: nindanti tuṣṇim āsīnaṁ nindanti bahubhāṣiṇam । alpabhāṇiṁ ca nindanti nāsti lokeṣv aninditaḥ ।।
uv29#29.46: ekāntaninditaḥ puruṣaḥ ekāntaṁ vā praśaṁsitaḥ ।nābhūd bhaviṣyati ca no na cāpy etarhi vidyate ।।
uv29#29.47: yaṁ tu vijñāḥ praśaṁsanti hy anuyujya śubhāśubham । praśaṁsā sā samākhyātā na tv ajñair yaḥ praśaṁsitaḥ ।।
uv29#29.48: medhāvinaṁ vṛttayuktaṁ prājñaṁ śīleṣu saṁvṛtam । niṣkaṁ jāmbunadasyaiva kas taṁ ninditum arhati ।।
uv29#29.49: śailo yathāpy ekaghano vāyunā na prakampyate । evaṁ nindāpraśaṁsābhir na kampyante hi paṇḍitāḥ ।।
uv29#29.50: yasya mūle tvacā nāsti parṇā nāsti tathā latāḥ । taṁ dhīraṁ bandhanān muktaṁ kas taṁ ninditum arhati ।।
uv29#29.51: yasya ha prapañcitaṁ hi no sat saṁtānaṁ parikhaṁ ca yo nivṛttaḥ । tṛṣṇāvigataṁ muniṁ carantaṁ na vijānāti sadevako 'pi lokaḥ ।।
uv29#29.52: yasya jitaṁ nopajīyate jitam anveti na kaṁ cid eva loke । taṁ buddham anantagocaraṁ hy apadaṁ kena padena neṣyasi ।।
uv29#29.53: yasya jālinī viṣaktikā tṛṣṇā nāsti hi lokanāyinī । taṁ buddham anantagocaraṁ hy apadaṁ kena padena neṣyasi ।।
uv29#29.54: yasya mūlaṁ kṣitau nāsti parṇā nāsti tathā latāḥ । taṁ dhīraṁ bandhanān muktaṁ ko nu ninditum arhati ।।
uv29#29.55: yasya jālinī viṣaktikā tṛṣṇā nāsti hi lokanāyinī । taṁ buddham anantavikramaṁ hy apadaṁ kena padena neṣyasi ।।
uv29#29.56: yasya vitarkā vidhūpitās tv ādhyātmaṁ vinivartitā hy aśeṣam । sa hi saṅgam atītya sarvasaṁjñāṁ yogāpetam atīrṇasaṅgam eti ।।
uv29#29.57: muñca purato muñca paścato madhye muñca bhavasya pāragaḥ । sarvatra vimuktamānaso na punar jātijarām upeṣyasi ।।
uv17#17.1: smṛtimantaḥ prayujyante na nikete ramanti te । haṁsavat palvalaṁ hitvā hy okam oghaṁ jahantĕ te ।।
uv17#17.2: haṁsādityapathe yānti ākāśe jīvitendriyāḥ ।niryānti dhīrā lokān mārasainyaṁ pramathya te ।।
uv17#17.3: acaritvā brahmacaryam alabdhvā yauvane dhanam । jīrṇakrauñcaivă dhyāyante 'lpamatsya iva palvale ।।
uv17#17.4: acaritvā brahmacaryam alabdhvā yauvane dhanam । śenti cāpātikīrṇā vā paurāṇāny anucintitāḥ ।।
uv17#17.5: nālpaṁ manyeta pāpasya naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati । udabindunipātena mahākumbho 'pi pūryate ।pūryanti bālāḥ pāpair hi stokastokaṁ kṛtair api ।।
uv17#17.6: nālpaṁ manyeta puṇyasya naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati । udabindunipātena mahākumbho 'pi pūryate ।pūryanti dhīrāḥ puṇyair hi stokastokaṁ kṛtair api ।।
uv17#17.7: ye taranty ārṇavaṁ nityaṁ kolaṁ baddhvā janāḥ śubham ।na te taranti saritāṁ tīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ ।।
uv17#17.8: uttīrṇo bhagavāṁ buddhaḥ sthale tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇaḥ । bhikṣavaḥ snānti caivātra kolaṁ badhnanti cāpare ।।
uv17#17.9: kiṁ kuryād udapānena yatrāpaḥ sarvato bhavet । tṛṣṇāyā mūlam uddhṛtya kasya paryeṣaṇāṇ caret ।।
uv17#17.10: udakena nijanti nejakā iṣukārā namayanti tejasā । dāruṁ namayanti takṣakā hy ātmānaṁ damayanti paṇḍitāḥ ।।
uv17#17.11: yathā hradaḥ sugambhīro viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ । evaṁ śrutvā hi saddharmaṁ viprasīdanti paṇḍitāḥ ।।
uv17#17.12: pṛthivīsadṛśo na lipyate tāyī kīlavad aprakampayaḥ । hrada iva hi vinītakardamo niṣkaluṣā hi bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ ।।
uv5#5.1: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam । priyebhyo vipramuktānāṁ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam ।।
uv5#5.2: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam । priyāṇām anyathībhāvād unmādam api gacchati ।।
uv5#5.3: śokā hi ye vai paridevitaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca lokasya hi naikarūpam । priyaṁ pratītyeha tad asti sarvaṁ priye 'sati syān na kathaṁ cid etat ।।
uv5#5.4: tasmād dhi te sukhitā vītaśokā yeṣāṁ priyaṁ nāsti kathaṁ cid eva । tasmād aśokaṁ padam eṣamāṇaḥ priyaṁ na kurvīta hi jīvaloke ।।
uv5#5.5: mā priyaiḥ saṁgamo jātu mā ca syād apriyaiḥ sadā ।priyāṇām adarśanaṁ duḥkham apriyāṇāṁ ca darśanam ।।
uv5#5.6: priyāṇāṁ ca vinābhāvād apriyāṇāṁ ca saṁgramāt । tīvra utpadyate śoko jīryante yena mānavāḥ ।।
uv5#5.7: priyaṁ mṛtaṁ kālagataṁ jñātayaḥ sahitāḥ sthitāḥ । śocanti dīrgham adhvānaṁ duḥkho hi priyasaṁgamaḥ ।।
uv5#5.8: tasmāt priyaṁ na kurvīta priyabhāvo hi pāpakaḥ । granthās teṣāṁ na vidyante yeṣāṁ nāsti priyāpriyam ।।
uv5#5.9: ayoge yujya cātmānaṁ yoge cāyujya sarvadā । arthaṁ hitvā priyagrāhī spṛhayaty arthayogine ।।
uv5#5.10: priyarūpasātagrathitā devakāyāḥ pṛthaksthitāḥ । āghādinaḥ paridyūnā mṛtyurājavaśaṁ gatāḥ ।।
uv5#5.11: ye vai divā ca rātrau caivāpramattāḥ priyaṁ jahati nityam । te vai khananti tv aghamūlaṁ mṛtyu-r-āmiṣaṁ durativartyam ।।
uv5#5.12: asādhu sādhurūpeṇa priyarūpeṇa cāpriyam । duḥkhaṁ sukhyasya rūpeṇa pramattān abhimardati ।।
uv5#5.13: ātmānaṁ cet priyaṁ vidyān nainaṁ pāpena yojayet । na hy etat sulabhaṁ bhavati sukhaṁ duṣkṛtakāriṇā ।।
uv5#5.14: ātmānaṁ cet priyaṁ vidyān nainaṁ pāpena yojayet । etad dhi sulabhaṁ bhavati sukhaṁ sukṛtakāriṇā ।।
uv5#5.15: ātmānaṁ cet priyaṁ vidyād rakṣed enaṁ surakṣitam ।yathā pratyantanagaraṁ gambhīraparikhaṁ dṛḍham ।trayāṇām anyatamaṁ yāmaṁ pratijāgreta paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv5#5.16: ātmānaṁ cet priyaṁ vidyād gopayet taṁ sugopitam ।yathā pratyantanagaraṁ guptam antarbahisthiram ।।
uv5#5.17: evaṁ gopayatātmānaṁ kṣano vo mā hy upatyagāt । kṣaṇātītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ ।।
uv5#5.18: sarvā diśas tv anuparigamya cetasā naivādhyagāt priyataram ātmanaḥ kva cit ।evaṁ priyaḥ pṛthagātmā pareṣāṁ tasmān na hiṁsyāt param ātmakāraṇam ।।
uv5#5.19: sarve daṇḍasya bibhyanti sarveṣāṁ jīvitaṁ priyam । ātmānam upamāṁ kṛtvā naiva hanyān na ghātayet ।।
uv5#5.20: cirapravāsinaṁ yadvad dūrataḥ svastināgatam । jñātayaḥ suhṛdo mitrāś cābhinandanti āgatam ।।
uv5#5.21: kṛtapuṇyaṁ tathā martyam asmāl lokāt paraṁ gatam । puṇyāny evābhinandanti priyaṁ jñātim ivāgatam ।।
uv5#5.22: tasmāt kuruta puṇyānāṁ nicayaṁ sāmparāyikam । puṇyāni paraloke hi pratiṣṭhā prāṇināṁ hi sā ।।
uv5#5.23: puṇyaṁ devāḥ praśaṁsanti samacaryāṁ ca yaś caret । iha cānindito bhavati pretya svarge ca modate ।।
uv5#5.24: dharmasthaṁ śīlasaṁpannaṁ hrīmantaṁ satyavādinam । ātmanaḥ kārakaṁ santaṁ taṁ janaḥ kurute priyam ।।
uv5#5.25: pareṣāṁ ca priyo bhavati hy ātmārthaṁ kriyate 'pi ca । dṛṣte ca dharme prāśaṁsyaḥ sāmparāye ca sadgatiḥ ।।
uv5#5.26: avavadetānuśāsīta cāsabhyāc ca nivārayet । asatāṁ na priyo bhavati satāṁ bhavati tu priyaḥ ।।
uv5#5.27: asantaś caiva santaś ca nānā yānti tv itaś cyutāḥ । asanto narakaṁ yānti santaḥ svargaparāyaṇāḥ ।।
uv9#9.1: ekadharmam atītasya mṛṣāvādasya jantunaḥ । vitīrṇaparalokasya nākāryaṁ pāpam asti yat ।।
uv9#9.2: śreyo hy ayoguḍā bhuktās taptā hy agniśikhopamāḥ । na tu bhuñjīta duḥśīlo rāṣṭrapiṇḍam asaṁyataḥ ।।
uv9#9.3: sa ced bibheṣi duḥkhasya sa cet te duḥkham apriyam । mā kārṣīḥ pāpakaṁ karma tv āvir vā yadi vā rahaḥ ।।
uv9#9.4: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kariṣyasi karoṣi vā । na te duḥkhāt pramokṣo 'sti hy utplutyāpi palāyataḥ ।।
uv9#9.5: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṁ vivaraṁ praviśya । na vidyate 'sau pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṁ na prasaheta karma ।।
uv9#9.5A: kṛṣṇaśuklāni karmāṇi na praṇaśyanti dehinaḥ । kālaṁ prā iṣyante kṛtāny upa nāni ca ।।
uv9#9.6: yat pareṣāṁ vigarheta karma dṛṣṭveha pāpakam । ātmanā tan na kurvīta karmabaddho hi pāpakaḥ ।।
uv9#9.7: ye kūṭamānayogena viṣameṇa ca karmaṇā । manuṣyān upahiṁsanti paratopakrameṇa vā ।te vai prapātaṁ prapatanti karmabaddhā hi te janāḥ ।।
uv9#9.8: yat karoti naraḥ karma kalyāṇam atha pāpakam । tasya tasyaiva dāyādo na hi karma praṇaśyati ।।
uv9#9.9: vilumpate hi puruṣo yāvad asyopakalpate । tato 'nye taṁ vilumpanti sa viloptā vilupyate ।।
uv9#9.10: kurvaṁ hi manyate bālo naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati । sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpakarmaṇām ।।
uv9#9.11: kurvaṁ hi manyate bālo naitaṁ mām āgamiṣyati । paścāt tu kaṭukaṁ bhavati vipākaṁ pratiṣevataḥ ।।
uv9#9.12: sa cet pāpāni karmāṇi kurvaṁ bālo na budhyate । karmabhiḥ svais tu durmedhā hy agnidagdhaiva tapyate ।।
uv9#9.13: caranti bālā duṣprajñā hy amitrair iva cātmabhiḥ । kurvantaḥ pāpakaṁ karma yad bhavati kaṭukaṁ phalaṁ ।।
uv9#9.14: na tat karma kṛtaṁ sādhu yat kṛtvā hy anutapyate । rudann aśrumukho yasya vipākaṁ pratiṣevate ।।
uv9#9.15: tat tu karma kṛtaṁ sādhu yat kṛtvā nānutapyate । yasya pratītaḥ sumanā vipākaṁ pratiṣevate ।।
uv9#9.16: hasantaḥ pāpakaṁ karma kurvanty ātmasukhaiṣiṇaḥ । rudantas tasya vīpākaṁ prativindanti duḥkhitāḥ ।।
uv9#9.17: na hi pāpakṛtaṁ karma sadyaḥ kṣīram iva mūrchati । dahantad bālam anveti bhasmācchanna ivānalaḥ ।।
uv9#9.18: na hi pāpakṛtaṁ karma sadyaḥ śastram iva kṛntati । sāmparāye tu jānāti yā gatiḥ pāpakarmaṇām । paścāt tu kaṭukaṁ bhavati vipākaṁ pratiṣevataḥ ।।
uv9#9.19: ayaso hi malaḥ samutthitaḥ sa tadutthāya tam eva khādati । evaṁ hy aniśāmyacāriṇaṁ svāni karmāṇi nayanti durgatim ।।
uv19#19.1: bhadro yathāśvaḥ kaśayābhispṛṣṭa hy ātāpinaḥ saṁvijitāś careta । śrāddhas tathā śīlaguṇair upetaḥ samāhito dharmaviniścayajñaḥ । jitendriyaḥ kṣāntibalair upeto jahāti sarvāṁ sa bhavān aśeṣān ।।
uv19#19.2: bhadro yathāśvaḥ kaśayābhitāḍita hy ātāpinaḥ saṁvijitāś careta । śrāddhas tathā śīlaguṇair upetaḥ samāhito dharmaviniścayajñaḥ ।saṁpannavidyācaraṇaḥ pratismṛtas tāyī sa sarvaṁ prajahāti duḥkham ।।
uv19#19.3: yasyendriyāṇi samatāṁ gatāni aśvo yathā sārathinā sudāntaḥ । prahīṇadoṣāya nirāsravāya devāpi tasmai spṛhayanti nityam ।।
uv19#19.4: apramattaḥ pramatteṣu supteṣu bahujāgaraḥ । abalāśva iva bhadrāśvaṁ hitvā yāti sumedhasam ।।
uv19#19.5: hrīniṣevī hi puruṣaḥ prājño yaḥ susamāhitaḥ । sarvapāpaṁ jahāty eṣa bhadrāśvo hi kaśām iva ।।
uv19#19.6: dānto vai samitiṁ yāti dāntaṁ rājādhirohati । dāntaḥ śreṣṭho manuṣyāṇāṁ yo 'tivākyaṁ titīkṣati ।।
uv19#19.7: yo hy aśvaṁ damayej jānyam ājāneyaṁ ca saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmā dāntas tato varam ।। [i] yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।। [ii]
uv19#19.8: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati । ātmanā hi sudāntena kṣipraṁ śāntiṁ nigacchati ।। [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena dānto dāntena gacchati ।। [ii]
uv19#19.8A: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19#19.8B: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena bhave duḥkhasya pāragaḥ ।।
uv19#19.8C: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19#19.9: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati । ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvās tyajati durgatīḥ ।। [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ tyajati durgatīḥ ।। [ii]
uv19#19.9A: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19#19.10: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati । ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvāṁ chinatti bandhanam ।। [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ chindati bandhanam ।। [ii]
uv19#19.10A: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19#19.11: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati । ātmanā hi sudāntena sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।। [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।। [ii]
uv19#19.11A: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19#19.11B: na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena sarvāṁ jahāti saṁpadam ।।
uv19#19.11C: yac cehāśvataraṁ damayed ājanyaṁ vāpi saindhavam । kuñjaraṁ vā mahānāgam ātmadāntas tato varam ।।
uv19#19.12: na hy asau tena yānena tāṁ bhūmim adhigacchati । ātmanā hi sudāntena nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।। [i] na hi tena sa yānena tāṁ bhūmim abhisaṁbhavet । yām ātmanā sudāntena nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।। [ii]
uv19#19.13: ātmānam eva damayed bhadrāśvam iva sārathiḥ । ātmanā hi sudāntena smṛtimāṁ duḥkhapāragaḥ ।।
uv19#19.14: ātmaiva hy ātmano nāthaḥ ātmā śaraṇam ātmanaḥ । tasmāt saṁyamayātmānaṁ bhadrāśvam iva sārathiḥ ।।
uv22#22.1: sādhu śrutaṁ sucaritaṁ sādhu cāpy aniketatā । pradakṣiṇaṁ pravrajyā ca śrāmaṇyasyānulomikam ।।
uv22#22.2: bālā ihāvijānantaś caranti hy amarā iva । vijānatāṁ tu saddharmam āturasyaiva śarvarī ।।
uv22#22.3: yathā hy agāraṁ succhannaṁ praviśya tamasā sphuṭam । vidyamānāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣmāṁ hi na paśyati ।।
uv22#22.4: tahaiveha naro nityaṁ jñānavān api yo bhavet । aśrutvā na vijānāti dharmāṁ kalyāṇapāpakān ।।
uv22#22.5: pradīpena tu rūpāṇi cakṣuṣmāṁ paśyate yathā । evaṁ śrutvā vijānāti dharmāṁ kalyāṇapāpakān ।।
uv22#22.6: śrutvā dharmāṁ vijānāti śrutvā pāpaṁ na sevate । śrutvā hy anarthaṁ varjayate śrutvā prāpnoti nirvṛtim ।।
uv22#22.7: bahuśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu tv asamāhitaḥ । śīlatas taṁ vigarhanti nāsya saṁpadyate śrutam ।।
uv22#22.8: alpaśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ । śīlatas taṁ praśaṁsanti tasya saṁpadyate śrutam ।।
uv22#22.9: alpaśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu tv asamāhitaḥ । ubhayatas taṁ vigarhanti nāsya saṁpadyate vratam ।।
uv22#22.10: bahuśruto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ । ubhayatas taṁ praśaṁsanti tasya saṁpadyate vratam ।।
uv22#22.11: bahuśrutaṁ dharmadharaṁ prājñaṁ nityaṁ samāhitam । niṣkaṁ jāmbunadasyaiva kas taṁ ninditum arhati ।।
uv22#22.12: ye me rūpeṇa minvanti ye me ghoṣeṇa cānvagāḥ । chandarāgavaśopetā na māṁ jānanti te janāḥ ।। [i] ye rūpeṇa pramiṇvanti māṁ ghoṣeṇānuyānti ca । chandarāgavaśopetā na māṁ jānanti te janāḥ ।। [ii]
uv22#22.13: ādhyātmaṁ ca na jānāti bahirdhā tu vipaśyati । bahirdāphaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22#22.14: ādhyātmaṁ tu prajānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati । ādhyātmaphaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22#22.15: ādhyātmaṁ ca na jānāti bahirdhā ca na paśyati । ubhaye 'phaladarśī tu sa vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22#22.16: ādhyātmaṁ ca prajānāti bahirdhā ca vipaśyati । sa tu niḥsaraṇaprajño na vai ghoṣeṇa nīyate ।।
uv22#22.17: bahu śṛṇoti śrotreṇa bahū paśyati cakṣuṣā । na tad dṛṣṭaṁ śrutaṁ dhīraḥ sarvaṁ śraddhātum arhati ।। [i] śrotreṇa śrūyate bahu dṛśyate bahu cakṣuṣā । na tad dṛṣṭaṁ śrutaṁ dhīraḥ sarvaṁ śraddhātum arhati ।। [ii]
uv22#22.18: vijñānasārāṇi subhāṣitāni jñātaṁ śrutaṁ caiva samādhisāram । na tasya vijñānaśrutaṁ mahārthaṁ yaḥ sāhaso bhavati naraḥ pramattaḥ ।।
uv22#22.19: dharme tu ye hy āryanivedite ratās tadā carante vacasā yadāhuḥ ।te kṣāntisauratyasamādhigocarāḥ śrutasya buddher api sāram adhyaguḥ ।।
uv27#27.1: supaśyaṁ paravadyaṁ syād ātmavadyaṁ tu durdṛśam । paraḥ parasya vadyāni tūtpunāti busaṁ yathā । ātmanaś chādayaty eṣa kṛtvā yadvat kaliṁ śaṭhaḥ ।।
uv27#27.2: paravadyānudarśino nityāvadhyānasaṁjñinaḥ । vāmā dharmāḥ pravardhante sa hy ārād dharmadarśanāt ।।
uv27#27.3: ahrīkena sujīvaṁ syāt kākaśūreṇa dhvāṅkṣiṇā । praskandinā pragalbhena saṁkliṣṭaṁ tv iha jīvate ।।
uv27#27.4: hrīmatā tv iha durjīvaṁ nityaṁ śucigaveṣiṇā । sulīnenāpragalbhena śuddhājīvena paśyatā ।।
uv27#27.5: andhabhūto hy ayaṁ lokas tanuko 'tra vipaśyakaḥ । śakunto jālamuktaiva hy alpaṁ svargeṣu modate ।।
uv27#27.6: moṣasaṁbandhano loko bhavyarūpa iva dṛśyate । upadhībandhanā bālās tamasā parivāritāḥ । asat sad iva dṛśyate paśyato nāsti kiñcanam ।।
uv27#27.7: ahaṁkārasṛtā martyāḥ parakāropasaṁhitāḥ । etad eke na jānanti paśyanti na hi śalyataḥ ।।
uv27#27.8: etat tu śalyaṁ pratiyatya paśyato hy adhyavasitā yatra prajāḥ prasaktāḥ । ahaṁ karomīti na tasya hiṁsyāt paraḥ karotīti na tasya hiṁsyāt ।।
uv27#27.9: mānopeto hy ayaṁ loko mānasaktaḥ sadā sthitaḥ । dṛṣṭibhiś caiva saṁrabdhaḥ saṁsāraṁ nātivartate ।।
uv27#27.10: yat prāptaṁ yac ca prāptavyaṁ rajaḥkīrṇam idaṁ dvayam । āturyam iti taṁ jñātvā jahyād vidvāṁ samāhitaḥ ।।
uv27#27.11: śikṣāsārāś ca ye satvā jīvino brahmajīvinaḥ ।upasthānarataye ca sa eko 'ntaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।।
uv27#27.12: bhoktavyāḥ śucayaḥ kāmā na doṣas teṣu vidyate । ya evaṁ darśino bālā dvitīyo 'ntaḥ prakīrtitaḥ ।।
uv27#27.13: etāv antāv anajñāya tv atilīyanti bāliśaḥ । apare tv atidhāvanti cakṣuṣmāṁs tāṁ prapaśyati ।।
uv27#27.14: etāv antau viditvā tu nābhavaṁs tatra ye budhāḥ । na caiva tena manyante vartmas teṣāṁ na vidyate ।।
uv27#27.15: yathā budbudikāṁ paśyed yathā paśyen marīcikām । evaṁ lokam avekṣaṁ vai mṛtyurājaṁ na paśyati ।।
uv27#27.16: yathā budbudikāṁ paśyed yathā paśyen marīcikām । evaṁ kāyam avekṣaṁ vai mṛtyurājaṁ na paśyati ।।
uv27#27.17: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam । yatra bālāḥ pramuhyante saṅgo nāsti prajānatām ।।
uv27#27.17A: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam । yatra bālā viṣīdanti paṇḍito 'tra virajyate ।।
uv27#27.18: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam । yatra bālā viṣīdanti yathā paṅke jaradgavaḥ ।।
uv27#27.19: paśyatemaṁ sadā kāyaṁ citraṁ rājarathopamam । yatra bālāḥ pramuhyante paṇḍito 'tra virajyate ।।
uv27#27.20: paśya citrakṛtaṁ bimbam arukaṁ kāyasaṁjñitam । āturaṁ moṣasaṁkalpaṁ yasya nāsti dhruvasthitiḥ ।।

uv27#27.27: kāmeṣu saktāḥ satataṁ hi mūḍhāḥ saṁyojane vadyam apaśyamānāḥ । na jātu saṁyojanasaṅgasaktā hy oghaṁ tareyur vipulaṁ mahāntam ।।
uv27#27.28: ūrdhvaṁ cādhaḥ sarvato vītarāgo hy ayam aham asmīti ca nānupaśyan । evaṁ vimukto hi tared ihaugham atīrṇapūrvaṁ hy apunarbhavāya ।।
uv27#27.29: yo nirvanagair vimokṣitaḥ saṁvanamukto vanam eva dhāvati । taṁ paśyatha pudgalaṁ tv imaṁ mukto bandhanam eva dhāvati ।।
uv27#27.30: nelāṅgaḥ śvetasaṁchanna ekāro vartate rathaḥ । anighaṁ paśyatāyāntaṁ chinnayoktram abandhanam ।।
uv27#27.31: bahavaḥ śaraṇaṁ yānti parvatāṁś ca vanāni ca । ārāmāṁ vṛkṣacaityāṁś ca manuṣyā bhayatarjitāḥ ।।
uv27#27.32: naitad dhi śaraṇaṁ kṣemaṁ naitac charaṇam uttamam । naitac charaṇam āgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।।
uv27#27.33: yas tu buddhaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca saṁghaṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gataḥ । catvāri cāryasatyāni prajñayā paśyate yadā ।।
uv27#27.34: duḥkhaṁ duḥkhasamutpādaṁ duḥkhasya samatikramam । āryaṁ cāṣṭāṅgikaṁ mārgaṁ duḥkhopaśamagāminam ।।
uv27#27.35: etad dhi śaraṇaṁ kṣemam etac charaṇam uttamam । etac charaṇam āgamya sarvaduḥkhāt pramucyate ।।
uv27#27.36: paśyataḥ paśyate paśyaṁ paśyate cāpy apaśyataḥ । apaśyaṁ paśyate naiva paśyato nāpy apaśyataḥ ।।
uv27#27.37: anupaśyanayā ca paśyanā nānātvaṁ hi tayor ihocyate । divasasya yathaiva rātribhiḥ saṁdhānaṁ ca tayor na vidyate ।।
uv27#27.38: anupaśyati cen na paśyati tv atha cet paśyati nānupaśyati । paśyann ayaṁ nānupaśyati tv anupaśyaṁs tu sadā na paśyati ।।
uv27#27.39: paśyaṁ nu kiṁ nānupaśyate kim apaśyaṁ nānupaśyate sadā । kasmiṁ sati hānupaśyanā kasmiṁ na sati nānupaśyanā ।।
uv27#27.40: duḥkhaṁ yad ayaṁ na paśyati tad apaśyann ātmeti paśyati । duḥkhaṁ tu yathā tathā prapaśyann ayam ātmeti sadānupaśyati ।।
uv27#27.41: yenāvṛtaḥ pṛthagjanaḥ saṁskārāṁ duḥkhaṁ na paśyati । tasmiṁ sati hānupaśyanā vigate 'smiṁ vigatānupaśyanā ।।
uv20#20.1: krodhaṁ jahed viprajahec ca mānaṁ saṁyojanaṁ sarvam atikrameta ।taṁ nāmne rūpe ca asajyamānam akiñcanaṁ nānupatanti saṅgāḥ ।।
uv20#20.2: krodhaṁ jahed utpatitaṁ rāgaṁ jātaṁ nivārayet । avidyāṁ prajahed dhīraḥ satyābhisamayāt sukham ।।
uv20#20.3: krodhaṁ hatvā sukhaṁ sete krodhaṁ hatvā na śocati । krodhasya viṣamūlasya madhuraghnasya bhikṣavaḥ । vadham āryāḥ praśaṁsanti taṁ ca hatvā na śocati ।।
uv20#20.4: yat tu rocayati kruddho duṣkṛtaṁ sukṛtaṁ tv iti । paścāt sa vigate krodhe spṛṣṭvāgnim iva tapyate ।।
uv20#20.5: ahrīkaś cānavatrāpī cāvrataś caiva roṣaṇaḥ । krodhena hy abhibhūtasya dvīpaṁ nāstīha kiṁ cana ।। [i] ahrīkyo 'py anavatrāpi bhavati krodhano 'vrataḥ । krodhena cābhibhūtasya na dvīpo bhavati kaś cana ।। [ii]
uv20#20.6: abalaṁ hi balaṁ tasya yasya krodhe balaṁ balam । kruddhasya dharmahīnasya pratipattir na vidyate ।।
uv20#20.7: yas tv ayaṁ balavāṁ bhūtvā durbalasya titīkṣati । tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ ।।
uv20#20.8: yaḥ pareṣāṁ prabhūḥ saṁs tu durbalāṁ saṁtitīkṣati । tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ ।।
uv20#20.9: atyukto hi parair yo vai balavāṁ saṁtitīkṣati । tām āhuḥ paramāṁ kṣāntiṁ nityaṁ kṣamati durbalaḥ ।।
uv20#20.10: ātmānaṁ ca paraṁ caiva mahato rakṣate bhayāt । yaḥ paraṁ kupitaṁ jñātvā svayaṁ tatropaśāmyati ।।
uv20#20.11: ubhayoś carate so 'rtham ātmanasya parasya ca । yaḥ paraṁ kupitaṁ jñātvā svayaṁ tatropaśāmyati ।।
uv20#20.12: ubhārthe caramāṇaṁ taṁ hy ātmanasya parasya ca । abalaṁ manyate bālo dharmeṣv avavicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
uv20#20.13: jayaṁ hi manyate bālo vacobhiḥ paruṣair vadan । nityam iva jayas tasya yo 'tivākyaṁ titīkṣati ।।
uv20#20.14: śreṣṭhasya vākyaṁ kṣamate bhayena saṁrambhahetoḥ sadṛśasya caiva । yo vai nihīnasya vacaḥ kṣameta tām uttamāṁ kṣāntim ihāhur āryāḥ ।।
uv20#20.15: kruddho vācaṁ na bhāṣeta pariṣatsv atha vā mithaḥ ।krodhābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ svam arthasṁ hi na budhyate ।।
uv20#20.16: satyaṁ vaden na ca krudhyed dadyād alpād api svayam । sthānair ebhis tribhir yukto devānām antikaṁ vrajet ।।
uv20#20.17: śāntasya hi kutaḥ krodho dāntasya samajīvinaḥ । samyagājñāvimuktasya krodho nāsti prajānataḥ ।।
uv20#20.18: tasyaiva pāpaṁ bhavati yaḥ kruddhe krudhyate punaḥ । kruddheṣv akruddhamānas tu saṁgrāmaṁ durjayaṁ jayet ।।
uv20#20.19: akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṁ sādhunā jayet ।jayet kadaryaṁ dānena satyena tv anṛtaṁ jayet ।।
uv20#20.20: akruddhasya kutaḥ krodho dāntasya samajīvinaḥ । samyagājñāvimuktasya krodhas tasya na vidyate ।।
uv20#20.21: akrodhaś cāvihiṁsā ca vasaty āryeṣu sarvadā । sadā pāpajane krodhas tiṣṭhati parvato yathā ।।
uv20#20.22: yas tv ihotpatitaṁ krodhaṁ rathaṁ bhrāntam iva dhārayet । vadāmi sārathiṁ taṁ tu raśmigrāho 'yam anyathā ।।
uv1#1.1: stīnamiddhaṁ vinodyeha saṁpraharṣya ca mānasam । śṛṇutemaṁ pravakṣyāmi udānaṁ jinabhāṣitam ।।
uv1#1.2: evam uktaṁ bhagavatā sarvābhijñena tāyinā । anukampakenarṣiṇā śarīrāntimadhāriṇā ।।
uv1#1.3: anityā bata saṁskārā utpādavyadharmiṇaḥ ।। utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṁ vyupaśamaḥ sukham ।।
uv1#1.4: ko nu harṣaḥ ka ānanda evaṁ prajvalite sati । andhakāraṁ praviṣṭāḥ stha pradīpaṁ na gaveṣatha ।।
uv1#1.5: yānīmāny apaviddhāni vikṣiptāni diśo diśam ।kāpotavarṇāny asthīni tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ ।।
uv1#1.6: yām eva prathamāṁ rātriṁ garbhe vasati mānavaḥ ।aviṣṭhitaḥ sa vrajati gataś ca na nivartate ।।
uv1#1.7: sāyam eke na dṛśyante kālyaṁ dṛṣṭā mahājanāḥ । kālyaṁ caike na dṛṣṭante sāyaṁ dṛṣṭā mahājanāḥ ।।
uv1#1.8: tatra ko viśvasen martyo daharo 'smīti jīvite । daharāpi mriyante hi narā nāryaś ca-n-ekaśaḥ ।।
uv1#1.9: garbha eke vinaśyante tathaike sūtikākule । parisṛptās tathā hy eke tathaike paridhāvinaḥ ।।
uv1#1.10: ye ca vṛddhā ye ca dahrā ye ca madhyamapuruṣāḥ ।anupūrvaṁ pravrajanti phalaṁ pakvaṁ va bandhanāt ।।
uv1#1.11: yathā phalānāṁ pakvānāṁ nityaṁ patanato bhayam । evaṁ jātasya martyasya nityaṁ maraṇato bhayam ।।
uv1#1.12: yathāpi kumbhakāreṇa mṛttikābhājanaṁ kṛtam । sarvaṁ bhedanaparyantam evaṁ martyasya jīvitam ।।
uv1#1.13: yathāpi tantre vitate yad yad utaṁ samupyate । alpaṁ bhavati vātavyam evaṁ martyasya jīvitam ।।
uv1#1.15: yathā nadī pārvatīyā gacchate na nivartate । evam āyur manuṣyāṇāṁ gacchate na nivartate ।।
uv1#1.16: kisaraṁ ca parittaṁ ca tac ca duḥkhena saṁyutam । udake daṇḍarājīva kṣipram eva vinaśyati ।।
uv1#1.17: yathā daṇḍena gopālo gāḥ prāpayati gocaram । evaṁ rogair jarāmṛtyuḥ āyuḥ prāpayate nṛṇām ।।
uv1#1.18: atiyānti hy ahorātrā jīvitaṁ coparudhyate । āyuḥ kṣīyati martyānāṁ kunadīṣu yathaudakam ।।
uv1#1.19: dīrghā jāgarato rātrir dīrghaṁ śrāntasya yojanam । dīrgho bālasya saṁsāraḥ saddharmam avijānataḥ ।।
uv1#1.20: putro me 'sti dhanaṁ me 'stīty evaṁ bālo vihanyate । ātmaiva hy ātmano nāsti kasya putraḥ kuto dhanam ।।
uv1#1.21: anekāni sahasrāṇi naranārīśatāni ca । bhogāṁ vai samudānīya vaśaṁ gacchanti mṛtyunaḥ ।।
uv1#1.22: sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ । saṁyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitam ।।
uv1#1.23: sarve satvā mariṣyanti maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitam । yathākarma gamiṣyanti puṇyapāpaphalopagāḥ ।।
uv1#1.24: narakaṁ pāpakarmāṇaḥ kṛtapuṇyās tu sadgatim ।anye tu mārgaṁ bhāvyeha nirvāsyanti nirāsravāḥ ।।
uv1#1.25: naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṁ vivaraṁ praviśya । na vidyate 'sau pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṁ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ ।।
uv1#1.26: ye ceha bhūtā bhaviṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve gamiṣyanti prahāya deham । tāṁ sarvahāniṁ kuśalo viditvā dharme sthito brahmacaryaṁ careta ।।
uv1#1.27: jīrṇaṁ ca dṛṣṭveha tathaiva rogiṇaṁ mṛtaṁ ca dṛṣṭvā vyapayātacetasam ।jahau sa dhīro gṛhabandhanāni kāmā hi lokasya na supraheyāḥ ।
uv1#1.28: jīryanti vai rājarathāḥ sucitrā hy atho śarīram api jarām upaiti । satāṁ tu dharmo na jarām upaiti santo hi taṁ satsu nivedayanti ।।
uv1#1.29: dhik tvām astu jare grāmye virūpakaraṇī hy asi । tathā manoramaṁ bimbaṁ jarayā hy abhimarditam ।।
uv1#1.30: yo 'pi varṣaśataṁ jīvet so 'pi mṛtyuparāyaṇaḥ । anu hy enaṁ jarā hanti vyādhir vā yadi vāntakaḥ ।।
uv1#1.31: sadā vrajanti hy anivartamānā divā ca rātrau ca vilujyamānāḥ । matsyā ivātīva hi tapyamānā duḥkhena jātīmaraṇena yuktāḥ ।।
uv1#1.32: āyur divā ca rātrau ca caratas tiṣṭhatas tathā । nadīnāṁ vā yathā sroto gacchate na nivartate ।।
uv1#1.33: yeṣāṁ rātridivāpāye hy āyur alpataraṁ bhavet । alpodake va matsyānāṁ kā nu teṣāṁ ratir bhavet ।।
uv1#1.34: parijīrṇam idaṁ rūpaṁ roganīḍaṁ prabhaṅguram । bhetsyate pūty asaṁdehaṁ maraṇāntaṁ hi jīvitam ।।
uv1#1.35: aciraṁ bata kāyo 'yaṁ pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate । śunyo vyapetavijñāno nirastaṁ vā kaḍaṅgaram ।।
uv1#1.36: kim anena śarīreṇa sravatā pūtinā sadā । nityaṁ rogābhibhūtena jarāmaraṇabhīruṇā ।।
uv1#1.37: anena pūtikāyena hy ātureṇa prabhaṅguṇā । nigacchatha parāṁ śāntiṁ yogakṣemam anuttaram ।।
uv1#1.38: iha varṣaṁ kariṣyāmi hemantaṁ grīṣmam eva ca । bālo vicintayaty evam antarāyaṁ na paśyati ।।
uv1#1.39: taṁ putrapaśusaṁmattaṁ vyāsaktamanasaṁ naram । suptaṁ grāmaṁ mahaughaiva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati ।।
uv1#1.40: na santi putrās trāṇāya na pitā nāpi bāndhavāḥ । antakenābhibhūtasya na hi trāṇā bhavanti te ।।
uv1#1.41: idaṁ kṛtaṁ me kartavyam idaṁ kṛtvā bhaviṣyati । ity evaṁ spondato martyāṁ jarā mṛtyuś ca mardati ।।
uv1#1.42: tasmāt sadā dhyānaratāḥ samāhitā hy ātāpino jātijarāntadarśinaḥ । māraṁ sasainyaṁ hy abhibhūya bhikṣavo bhaveta jātīmaraṇasya pāragāḥ ।।
uv16#16.1: pūrvaṁ hi kṛtyaṁ pratijāgareta mā me kṛtyaṁ kṛtyakāle vihanyāt ।taṁ nityakāle pratiyatyakāriṇaṁ naiva kṛtyaṁ kṛtyakāle vihanti ।।
uv16#16.2: vyāyametaiva puruṣo yāvad arthasya niṣpadaḥ । paśyed asau tathātmārthaṁ yathaivecchet tathā bhavet ।।
uv16#16.3: uttiṣṭhata vyāyamata kurudhvaṁ dvīpam ātmanaḥ । karmāro rajatasyaiva haradhvaṁ malam ātmanaḥ ।. nirdhāntamalā hy anaṅgaṇā na punar jātijarām upeṣyetha ।।
uv16#16.4: alajjitavye lajjante lajjitavye tv alajjinaḥ । abhaye bhayadarśīno bhaye cābhayadarśinaḥ । mithyādṛṣṭisamādānāt satvā gacchanti durgatim ।।
uv16#16.5: yas tu pūrvaṁ pramādyeha paścād vai na pramādyate । sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ ।।
uv16#16.6: yas tu pūrvaṁ pramādyeha paścād vai na pramādyate । sa imāṁ viṣaktikāṁ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate ।।
uv16#16.7: daharo 'pi cet pravrajate yujyate buddhaśāsane । sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ ।।
uv16#16.8: daharo 'pi cet pravrajate yujyate buddhaśāsane । sa imāṁ viṣaktikāṁ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate ।।
uv16#16.9: yasya pāpakṛtaṁ karma kuśalena pithīyate । sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ ।।
uv16#16.10: yasya pāpakṛtaṁ karma kuśalena pithīyate । sa imāṁ viṣaktikāṁ loke smṛtaḥ samativartate ।।
uv16#16.11: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇānte ca sarvaśaḥ । sa vai dṛṣṭapado dhīro maraṇānte na śocate ।।
uv16#16.12: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇānte ca sarvaśaḥ । sa vai dṛṣṭapado dhīraḥ śokamadhye na śocati ।।
uv16#16.13: yo jīvite na tapate maraṇānte ca sarvaśaḥ । sa vai dṛṣṭapado dhīro jñātimadhye virocate ।।
uv16#16.14: kṛṣnāṁ dharmāṁ viprahāya śuklāṁ bhāvayata bhikṣavaḥ । okād anokam āgamya vivekam anubṛṁhayet । tatra cābhirametāryo hitvā kāmān akiñcanaḥ ।।
uv16#16.15: śuddhasya hi sadā phalguḥ śuddhasya poṣathaḥ sadā । śuddhasya śucikarmaṇaḥ sadā saṁpadyate vratam ।।
uv16#16.16: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi rāgadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā । tasmād vigatarāgebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv16#16.17: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi dveṣadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā । tasmād vigatadveṣebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv16#16.18: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi mohadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā । tasmād vigatamohebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv16#16.19: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi mānadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā । tasmād vigatamānebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv16#16.20: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi lobhadoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā । tasmād vigatalobhebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv16#16.21: kṣetrāṇi tṛṇadoṣāṇi tṛṣṇādoṣā tv iyaṁ prajā । tasmād vigatatṛṣṇebhyo dattaṁ bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv16#16.22: ṣaṣṭha adhipatī rājā rajyamāne rajasvalaḥ । arakte virajā bhavati rakte bālo nirucyate ।।
uv16#16.23: nagaraṁ hy asthiprākāraṁ māṁsaśoṇitalepanam । yatra rāgaś ca dveṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca bādhyate ।।
uv16#16.24: hetuprabhavaṁ sadā hi duḥkhaṁ tad apaśyaṁ sa hi tena tatra baddhaḥ । tasya tu samayāj jahāti saṅgaṁ na hi bāhyā prajahanti taṁ mahaugham ।।
uv24#24.1: yac ca gāthāśataṁ bhāṣed anarthapadasaṁhitam । ekam arthapadaṁ śreyo yac chrutvā hy upaśāmyati ।।
uv24#24.2: yac ca gāthāśataṁ bhāṣed adharmapadasaṁhitam । ekaṁ dharmapadaṁ śreyo yac chrutvā hy upaśāmyati ।।
uv24#24.3: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved duḥśīlo hy asamāhitaḥ । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ sadā śīlavataḥ śuceḥ ।।
uv24#24.4: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved duṣprajño hy asamāhitaḥ । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ prājñasya dhyāyinaḥ sadā ।।
uv24#24.5: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīvet kusīdo hīnavīryavān । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyo vīryam ārabhato dṛḍham ।।
uv24#24.6: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann udayavyayam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy udayavyayam ।।
uv24#24.7: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyaṁ vedanākṣayam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato vedanākṣayam ।।
uv24#24.8: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann āsravakṣayam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy āsravakṣayam ।।
uv24#24.9: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann acalaṁ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy acalaṁ padam ।।
uv24#24.10: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann acyutaṁ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy acyutaṁ padam ।।
uv24#24.11: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann arajaḥ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy arajaḥ padam ।।
uv24#24.12: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyaṁ virajaḥ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato virajaḥ padam ।।
uv24#24.13: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyaṁ durdṛśaṁ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato durdṛśaṁ padam ।।
uv24#24.14: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann uttamaṁ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy uttamaṁ padam ।।
uv24#24.15: yac ca varṣaśataṁ jīved apaśyann amṛtaṁ padam । ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ śreyaḥ paśyato hy amṛtaṁ padam ।।
uv24#24.16: yac ca varṣaśataṁ pūrṇam agniṁ paricared vane । yac caikaṁ bhāvitātmānaṁ muhūrtam api pūjayet । sā tasya pūjanā śreṣṭhā na tad varṣaśataṁ hutam ।।

uv6#6.1: śīlaṁ rakṣeta medhāvī prārthayaṁ vai sukhatrayam । praśaṁsā vittalābhaṁ ca pretya svarge ca modanam ।।
uv6#6.2: sthānāny etāni saṁpaśyaṁ śīlaṁ rakṣeta paṇḍitaḥ । āryo darśanasaṁpannaḥ sa loke labhate śivam ।।
uv6#6.3: sukhaṁ śīlasamādānaṁ kāyo na paridahyate । sukhaṁ ca rātrau svapati pratibuddhaś ca nandati ।।
uv6#6.4: śīlaṁ yāvaj jarā sādhu śraddhā sādhu pratiṣṭhitā ।prajñā narāṇāṁ ratnaṁ vai puṇyaṁ coraiḥ sudurharam ।।
uv6#6.5: kṛtvā puṇyāni saprajño datvā dānāni śīlavān । iha cātha paratrāsau sukhaṁ samadhigacchati ।।
uv6#6.6: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣur indriyaiś ca susaṁvṛtaḥ । bhojane cāpi mātrajño yukto jāgarikāsu ca ।।
uv6#6.7: viharann evam ātāpī hy ahorātram atandritaḥ । abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।।
uv6#6.8: śīle pratiṣṭhito bhikṣuś cittaṁ prajñāṁ ca bhāvayet । ātāpī nipako nityaṁ prāpnuyād duḥkhasaṁkṣayam ।।
uv6#6.9: tasmāt satataśīlī syāt samādher anurakṣakaḥ ।vipaśyanāyāṁ śikṣec ca saṁprajānapratismṛtaḥ ।।
uv6#6.10: sa tu vikṣīnasaṁyogaḥ kṣīṇamāno niraupadhiḥ ।kāyasya bhedāt saprajñaḥ saṁkhyān nopaiti nirvṛtaḥ ।।
uv6#6.11: śīlaṁ samādhiḥ prajñā ca yasya hy ete subhāvitāḥ ।so 'tyantaniṣṭho vimalas tv aśokaḥ kṣīṇasaṁbhavaḥ ।।
uv6#6.12: saṅgāt pramukto hy asita ājñātāvī niraupadhiḥ ।atikramya māraviṣayam ādityo vā virocate ।।
uv6#6.13: uddhatasya pramattasya bhikṣuṇo bahirātmanaḥ ।śīlaṁ samādhiḥ prajñā ca pāripūriṁ na gacchati ।।
uv6#6.14: channam evābhivarṣati vivṛtaṁ nābhivarṣati । tasmād dhi cchannaṁ vivared evaṁ taṁ nābhivarṣati ।।
uv6#6.15: etad dhi dṛṣṭvā śikṣeta sadā śīleṣu paṇḍitaḥ । nirvāṇagamanaṁ mārgaṁ kṣipram eva viśodhayet ।।
uv6#6.16: na puṣpagandhaḥ prativātam eti na vāhnijāt tagarac candanād vā । satāṁ tu gandhaḥ prativātam eti sarvā diśaḥ satpuruṣaḥ pravāti ।।
uv6#6.17: tagarāc candanāc cāpi vārṣikāyās tathotpalāt । etebhyo gandhajātebhyaḥ śīlagandhas tv anuttaraḥ ।।
uv6#6.18: alpamātro hy ayaṁ gandho yo 'yaṁ tagaracandanāt । yas tu śīlavatāṁ gandho vāti deveṣv apīha saḥ ।।
uv6#6.19: teṣāṁ viśuddhaśīlānām apramādavihāriṇām । samyagājñāvimuktānāṁ māro mārgaṁ na vindati ।।
uv6#6.20: eṣa kṣemagamo mārga eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye । pratipannakāḥ prahāsyanti dhyāyino mārabandhanam ।।
uv33#33.1: na nagnacaryā na jaṭā na paṅkā no 'nāśanaṁ sthaṇḍilaśāyikā vā । na rajomalaṁ notkuṭukaprahāṇaṁ śodheta martyaṁ hy avitīrṇakāṅkṣam ।।
uv33#33.2: alaṁkṛtaś cāpi careta dharmaṁ kṣānto dāṇṭo niyato brahmacārī । sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidhāya daṇḍaṁ sa brahmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ ।।
uv33#33.3: bhaveṣv eva hi sajyanta eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ । antareṇa viṣīdanti hy aprāpyaivāsravakṣayam ।।
uv33#33.4: bhaveṣv eva hi sajyanta eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ । vigṛhya vivadantīme bālā hy ekāntadarśinaḥ ।।
uv33#33.5: bhaveṣv eva hi sajyanta eke śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ । antareṇa viṣīdanti hy aprāpyaivottamaṁ padam ।।
uv33#33.6: kiṁ te jaṭābhir durbuddhe kiṁ cāpy ajinaśāṭibhiḥ ।abhyantaraṁ te gahanaṁ bāhyakaṁ parimārjasi ।।
uv33#33.6A: kiṁ te jaṭābhir durbuddhe kiṁ cāpy ajinaśāṭibhiḥ ।abhyantaraṁ te kaluṣaṁ bāhyakaṁ parimārjasi ।।
uv33#33.7: na jaṭābhir na gotreṇa na jātyā brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ । yasya satyaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca sa śucir brāhmaṇaḥ sa ca ।।
uv33#33.8: na jaṭābhir na gotreṇa na jātyā brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ । yas tu vāhayate pāpāny aṇusthūlāni sarvaśaḥ । vāhitatvāt tu pāpānāṁ brāhmaṇo vai nirucyate ।।
uv33#33.9: na muṇḍitena śramaṇo na bhoḥkāreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ । yasya satyaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca brāhmaṇaḥ śramaṇaḥ sa ca ।।
uv33#33.10: na muṇḍitena śramaṇo na bhoḥkāreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ । yas tu vāhayate pāpāny aṇusthūlāni sarvaśaḥ । vāhitatvāt tu pāpānāṁ brāhmaṇaḥ śramaṇaḥ sa ca ।।
uv33#33.11: nodakena śucir bhavati bahv atra snāti vai janaḥ । yasya satyaṁ ca dharmaṁ ca sa śucir brāhmaṇaḥ sa ca ।।
uv33#33.12: pravāhya pāpakāṁ dharmāṁ ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ । kṣīṇasaṁyojanā buddhā brāhmaṇās te prakīrtitāḥ ।।
uv33#33.13: yo brāhmaṇo vāhitapāpadharmo niṣkautilyo niṣkaṣāyaḥ sthitātmā । vedāntagaś coṣitabrahmacaryaḥ kālenāsau brahmavādaṁ vadeta ।।
uv33#33.14: yasmiṁ na māyā vasate na māno yo vītalobho hy amamo nirāśaḥ । praṇunnadoṣo hy abhinirvṛtātmā sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ ।।
uv33#33.15: bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ nāhaṁ yonijaṁ mātṛsaṁbhavam । bhovādī nāma sa bhavati sa ced bhavati sakiñcanaḥ । akiñcanam anādānaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.16: yasya kāyena vācā ca manasā ca na duṣkṛtam । susaṁvṛtaṁ tṛbhiḥ sthānair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.17: yo 'karkaśāṁ vijñapanīṁ giraṁ nityaṁ prabhāṣate । yayā nābhiṣajet kaś cid bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.18: ākrośāṁ vadhabandhāṁś ca yo 'praduṣṭas titīkṣate । kṣāntivratabalopetaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.19: akrodhanaṁ vratavantaṁ śīlavantaṁ bahuśrutam । dāntam antimaśārīraṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.20: asaṁsṛṣṭaṁ gṛhasthebhir anagārais tathobhayam । anokasāriṇaṁ tuṣṭaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.21: āgataṁ nābhinandanti prakramantaṁ na śocati । saṅgāt saṁgrāmajin mukto bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.22: āgataṁ nābhinandanti prakramantaṁ na śocati । aśokaṁ virajaṁ śāntaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.23: ananyapoṣī hy ājñātā dāntaḥ sāre pratiṣṭitaḥ ।kṣīṇāsravo vāntadoṣo yaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ ।।
uv33#33.24: yasya pāram apāraṁ ca pārāpāraṁ na vidyate । pāragaṁ sarvadharmāṇāṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.25: yas tu dīrghaṁ tathā hrasvam aṇusthūlaṁ śubhāśubham । loke na kiṁ cid ādatte bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.26: yasya pāram apāraṁ ca pārāpāraṁ na vidyate । asaktaṁ triṣu lokeṣu bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.27: ihaiva yaḥ prajānāti duḥkhasya kṣayam ātmanaḥ । vītarāgaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.28: yas tu puṇyais tathā pāpair ubhayena na lipyate । aśokaṁ nirjvaraṁ śāntaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.29: yas tu puṇyaṁ ca pāpaṁ cāpy ubhau saṅgāv upatyagāt । saṅgātigaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.29A: yasya paścāt pure cāpi madhye cāpi na vidyate । virajaṁ bandhanān muktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.30: vāri puṣkarapatreṇevārāgreṇeva sarṣapaḥ ।na lipyate yo hi kāmair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.31: vāri puṣkarapatreṇevārāgreṇeva sarṣapaḥ ।na lipyate yo hi pāpair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.31A: candro vā vimalaḥ śuddho viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ ।na lipyate yo hi kāmair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.31B: candro vā vimalaḥ śuddho viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ ।na lipyate yo hi pāpair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.31C: candro vā vimalaḥ śuddho viprasanno hy anāvilaḥ । nandībhavaparikṣīṇaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.32: dhyāyinaṁ vītarajasaṁ kṛtakṛtyam anāsravam । kṣīṇāsravaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.33: gambhīrabuddhiṁ medhāḍhyam mārgāmārgeṣu kovidam । uttamārtham anuprāptaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.34: yas tu kaś cin manuṣyeṣu bhaikṣācaryeṇa jīvati । amamo 'hiṁsako nityaṁ dhṛtimāṁ brahmacaryavān । ājñāya dharmaṁ deśayati bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.35: sarvakāmāṁ viprahāya yo 'nagāraḥ parivrajet । kāmāsravavisaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.36: nikṣiptadaṇḍaṁ bhūteṣu traseṣu sthāvareṣu ca । yo na hanti hi bhūtāni bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.37: ākāśam iva paṅkena rajasā candramā iva ।na lipyate yo hi kāmair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.38: ākāśam iva paṅkena rajasā candramā iva ।na lipyate yo hi pāpair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
