uv33#33.39: aviruddho viruddheṣu tv āttadaṇḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ ।hitānukampī bhūteṣu bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.40: yasya rāgaś ca doṣaś ca māno mrakṣaś ca śātitaḥ ।na lipyate yaś ca doṣair bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.41: ya imāṁ parikhāṁ durgāṁ saṁsāraugham upatyagāt । tīrṇaḥ pāragato dhyāyī hy aneyo niṣkathaṁkathaḥ । nirvṛtaś cānupādāya bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.42: na vidyate yasya tṛṣṇā cāsmiṁ loke pare 'pi ca । tṛṣṇābhavaparikṣīṇaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.43: na vidyate yasya cāśā hy asmiṁ loke pare 'pi ca । nirāśiṣaṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.44: hitvā ratiṁ cāratiṁ ca śītībhūto niraupadhiḥ । sarvalokābhibhūr dhīro bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.45: hitvā mānuṣyakāṁ kāmāṁ divyāṁ kāmān upatyagāt । sarvalokavisaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.46: gatiṁ yasya na jānanti devagandharvamānuṣāḥ । anantajñānasaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.47: pūrvenivāsaṁ yo vetti svargāpāyāṁś ca paśyati । atha jātikṣayaṁ prāpto hy abhijñāvyavasito muniḥ । duḥkhasyāntaṁ prajānāti bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.48: cyutiṁ yo vetti satvānām upapattiṁ ca sarvaśaḥ । asaktaḥ sugato buddho bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.49: sarvasaṁyojanātīto yo vai na paritasyate । asaktaḥ sugato buddho bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.50: ṛṣabhaṁ pravaraṁ nāgaṁ maharṣiṁ vijitāvinam । aneyaṁ snātakaṁ buddhaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।। [i] ṛṣabhaḥ pravaro nāgo maharṣir vijitāvinaḥ । yo 'neyaḥ snātako buddho brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham ।। [ii]
uv33#33.51: sarvābhibhūṁ bhavātītam oghatīrṇam anāsravam । pāraṁ gataṁ visaṁyuktaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।। [i] sarvābhibhūr bhavātīta oghatīrṇo vināyakaḥ । pārago hi visaṁyukto brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham ।। [ii]
uv33#33.52: gatābhidhyaṁ vītajalpaṁ pāpacittavivarjitam ।dhyāyinaṁ vītarajasaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।। [i] nābhidhyāyen nābhijalpet pāpakānāṁ vivarjayet । āsīno virajā dhyāyī brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham ।। [ii]
uv33#33.53: pāṁsukūladharaṁ bhikṣuṁ kāmeṣu niravekṣiṇaṁ । dhyāyantaṁ vṛkṣamūlasthaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।। [i] pāṁsukūladharo hrīmāṁ kāmeṣu niravekṣakaḥ । niṣaṇṇo vṛkṣamūle yo brāhmaṇaṁ taṁ bravīmy aham ।। [ii]
uv33#33.54: yasyālayo nāsti sadā yo jñātā niṣkathaṁkathaḥ । amṛtaṁ caiva yaḥ prāpto bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।।
uv33#33.56: yeṣāṁ ca bhāvito mārgaḥ āryo hy aṣṭāṅgikaḥ śivaḥ । sarvaduḥkhaprahāṇāya lokeṣu brāhmaṇā hi te
uv33#33.57: arūpiṇaṁ sadā cittam asāram anidarśanam । damayitvā hy abhijñāya ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ । kṣīṇasaṁyojanā buddhā lokeṣu brāhmaṇā hi te ।। [i] arūpam anidarśanam anantam asudarśanam । sūkṣmaṁ padam abhijñāya ye caranti sadā smṛtāḥ । kṣīṇasaṁyojanā buddhās te loke brāhmaṇā iha ।। [ii]
uv33#33.58: chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ca saṁtānaṁ duratikramam । utkṣiptaparikhaṁ buddhaṁ bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।। [i] chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ye saṁtānaṁ duratikramam । utkṣiptaparikhā buddhās te loke brāhmaṇā iha ।। [ii]
uv33#33.59: chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ca icchālobhaṁ ca pāpakam ।tṛṣṇāṁ samūlām āvṛhya bravīmi brāhmaṇaṁ hi tam ।। [i] chitvā naddhrīṁ varatrāṁ ye icchālobhaṁ ca pāpakam । samūlāṁ coddhṛtās tṛṣṇāṁ te loke brāhmaṇā iha ।। [ii]
uv33#33.60: chindi srotaḥ parākramya kāmāṁ praṇuda brāhmaṇa । saṁskārāṇāṁ kṣayaṁ jñātvā hy akṛtajño bhaviṣyasi ।। [i] chindi srotaḥ parākramya kāmāṁ sarvāṁ praṇuda ca । saṁskārāṇāṁ kṣayaṁ jñātvā brāhmaṇo yāti hānighaḥ ।। [ii]
uv33#33.61: mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hatvā rājānaṁ dvau ca śrotiyau । rāṣṭraṁ sānucaraṁ hatvā anigho yāti brāhmaṇaḥ ।।
uv33#33.62: mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hatvā rājānaṁ dvau ca śrotiyau । vyāghraṁ ca pañcamaṁ hatvā śuddha ity ucyate naraḥ ।।
uv33#33.63: na brāhmaṇasya praharen na ca muñceta brāhmaṇaḥ । dhig brāhmaṇasya hantāraṁ dhik taṁ yaś ca pramuñcati ।।
uv33#33.64: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyād vṛddasya daharasya vā । satkṛtyainaṁ namasyeta hy agnihotram iva dvijaḥ ।।
uv33#33.65: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyād vṛddasya daharasya vā । satkṛtyainaṁ paricared agnihotram iva dvijaḥ ।।
uv33#33.66: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyāt samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam । satkṛtyainaṁ namasyeta hy agnihotram iva dvijaḥ ।।
uv33#33.67: yasya dharmaṁ vijānīyāt samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam ।satkṛtyainaṁ paricared agnihotram iva dvijaḥ ।।
uv33#33.68: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet । atha caikaḥ piśācīṁ ca bakkulaṁ cātivartate ।।
uv33#33.69: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet । athāsya vedanāḥ sarve astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ ।।
uv33#33.70: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet । athāsya pratyayāḥ sarve astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ ।।
uv33#33.71: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet । athāsya cāsravāḥ sarve astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ ।।
uv33#33.72: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet । athāsya sarvasaṁyogā astaṁ gacchanti paśyataḥ ।।
uv33#33.73: yadā hi sveṣu dharmeṣu brāhmaṇaḥ pārago bhavet । atha jātijarāṁ caiva maraṇaṁ cātivartate ।।
uv33#33.74: divā tapati hādityo rātrāv ābhāti candramāḥ ।saṁnaddhaḥ kṣatriyas tapati dhyāyī tapati brāhmaṇaḥ । atha nityam ahorātraṁ buddhas tapati tejasā ।।
uv33#33.75: na brāhmaṇasyedṛśam asti kiṁ cid yathā priyebhyo manaso niṣedhaḥ ।yathā yathā hy asya mano nivartate tathā tathā saṁvṛtam eti duḥkham ।।
uv33#33.76: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetuduḥkham ।।
uv33#33.77: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā prajānāti sahetudharmam ।।
uv33#33.78: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ pratyayānām upaiti ।।
uv33#33.79: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ vedanānām upaiti ।।
uv33#33.80: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । athāsya kāṅkṣā vyapayānti sarvā yadā kṣayaṁ hy āsravāṇām upaiti ।।
uv33#33.81: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । avabhāsayaṁs tiṣṭhati sarvalokaṁ sūryo yathaivābhyudito 'ntarīkṣam ।।
uv33#33.82: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । avabhāsayaṁs tiṣṭhati sarvalokaṁ buddho hi saṁyojanavipramuktaḥ ।।
uv33#33.83: yadā tv ime tu prabhavanti dharmā ātāpino dhyāyato brāhmaṇasya । vidhūpayaṁs tiṣṭhati mārasainyaṁ buddho hi saṁyojanavipramukta iti ।।
uv11#11.1: chindhi srotaḥ parākramya kāmāṁ praṇuda sarvaśaḥ । nāprahāya muniḥ kāmān ekatvam adhigacchati ।।
uv11#11.2: kurvāṇo hi sadā prājño dṛḍham eva parākramet । śithilā khalu pravrajyā hy ādadāti puno rajaḥ ।।
uv11#11.3: yat kiṁ cic chitilaṁ karma saṁkliṣṭaṁ vāpi yat tapaḥ ।apariśuddhaṁ brahmacaryaṁ na tad bhavati mahāphalam ।।
uv11#11.4: śaro yathā durgṛhīto hastam evāpakṛntati । śrāmaṇyaṁ duṣparāmṛṣṭaṁ narakān upakarṣati ।।
uv11#11.5: śaro yathā sugṛhīto na hastam apakṛntati । śrāmaṇyaṁ suparāmṛṣṭaṁ nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।।
uv11#11.6: duṣkaraṁ dustitīkṣaṁ ca śrāmaṇyaṁ mandabuddhinā । bahavas tatra saṁbādhā yatra mando viḍīdati ।।
uv11#11.7: śrāmaṇye carate yas tu svacittam anivārayet । punaḥ punar viṣīdet ca saṁkalpānāṁ vaśaṁ gataḥ ।।
uv11#11.8: duṣpravrajyaṁ durabhiramaṁ duradhyāvasitā gṛhāḥ । duḥkhāsamānasaṁvāsā duḥkāś copacitā bhavāḥ ।।
uv11#11.9: kāṣāyakaṇṭhā bahavaḥ pāpadharmā hy asaṁyatāḥ । pāpā hi karmabhiḥ pāpair ito gacchanti durgatim ।।
uv11#11.10: yo 'sāv atyantaduḥśīlaḥ sālavāṁ mālutā yathā । karoty asau tathāṭmānaṁ yathainaṁ dviṣa-d-icchati ।।
uv11#11.11: sthaviro na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā palitaṁ śiraḥ । paripakvaṁ vayas tasya mohajīrṇaḥ sa ucyate ।।
uv11#11.12: yas tu puṇyaṁ ca pāpaṁ ca prahāya brahmacaryavān ।viśreṇayitvā carati sa vai sthavira ucyate ।।
uv11#11.13: na muṇḍabhāvāc chramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtaṁ vadan । icchālobhasamāpannaḥ śramaṇaḥ kiṁ bhaviṣyati ।।
uv11#11.14: na muṇḍabhāvāc chramaṇo hy avṛtas tv anṛtaṁ vadan । śamitaṁ yena pāpaṁ syād aṇusthūlaṁ hi sarvaśaḥ । śamitatvāt tu pāpānāṁ śramaṇo hi nirucyate ।।
uv11#11.15: brāhmaṇo vāhitaiḥ pāpaiḥ śramaṇaḥ śamitāśubhaḥ ।pravrājayitvā tu malān uktaḥ pravrajitas tv iha ।।
uv32#32.1: piṇḍacārikāya bhikṣave hy ātmabharāya nānyapoṣiṇe । devāḥ spṛhayanti tāyine hy upaśāntāya sadā smṛtātmane ।।
uv32#32.2: piṇḍapātikāya bhikṣave hy ātmabharāya nānyapoṣiṇe । devāḥ spṛhayanti tāyine na tu satkārayaśo 'bhikāṅkṣiṇe ।।
uv32#32.3: sarvakarmajahasya bhikṣuṇo dhunvānasya puraskṛtaṁ rajaḥ । amamasya sadā sthitātmano hy artho nāsti janasya lāpanam ।।
uv32#32.4: tudanti vācābhir asaṁyatā janāḥ śarair hi saṁgrāmagataṁ yathā gajam । śrutvā tu vācāṁ paruṣām udīritām adhivāsayed bhikṣur aduṣṭacittaḥ ।।
uv32#32.5: yas tv alpajīvī laghur ātmakāmo yatendriyaḥ sarvagatiḥ pramuktaḥ । anokasārī hy amamo nirāśaḥ kāmaṁjahaś caikacaraḥ sa bhikṣuḥ ।।
uv32#32.6: mātraṁ bhajeta pratirūpaṁ śuddhājīvo bhavet sadā । pratisaṁstāravṛttiḥ syād ācārakuśalo bhavet ।tataḥ prāmodyabahulaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet ।।
uv32#32.7: hastasaṁyataḥ pādasaṁyato vācāsaṁyataḥ sarvasaṁyataḥ । ādhyātmarataḥ samāhito hy ekaḥ saṁtuṣito hi yaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ ।।
uv32#32.8: dharmārāmo dharmarato dharmam evānucintayan । dharmaṁ cānusmaraṁ bhikṣur dharmān na parihīyate ।।
uv32#32.9: śunyāgāraṁ praviṣṭasya prahitātmasya bhikṣuṇaḥ । amānuṣā ratir bhavati samyag dharmāṁ vipaśyataḥ ।।
uv32#32.10: yato yataḥ saṁpṛśati skandhānām udayavyayam । prāmodyaṁ labhate tatra prītyā sukham analpakam ।tataḥ prāmodyabahulaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet ।।
uv32#32.11: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate । evaṁ rāgakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate ।।
uv32#32.12: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate । evaṁ dveṣakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate ।।
uv32#32.13: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate । evaṁ mohakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate ।।
uv32#32.14: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate । evaṁ mānakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate ।।
uv32#32.15: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate । evaṁ lobhakṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate ।।
uv32#32.16: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate । evaṁ tṛṣṇākṣayād bhikṣuḥ śailavan na prakampate ।।
uv32#32.17: yasya saṁnicayo nāsti yasya nāsti mamāyitam । asantaṁ śocate naiva sa vai bhikṣur nirucyate ।।
uv32#32.18: bhikṣur na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā bhikṣate parān । veśmāṁ dharmāṁ samādāya bhikṣur bhavati na tāvatā ।।
uv32#32.19: yas tu puṇyaṁ ca pāpaṁ ca prahāya brahmacaryavān । viśreṇayitvā carati sa vai bhikṣur nirucyate ।।
uv32#32.20: maitrāvihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddhaśāsane । adhigacchet padaṁ śāntam asecanakadarśanam ।।
uv32#32.21: maitrāvihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddhaśāsane । adhigacchet padaṁ śāntam saṁskāropaśamaṁ sukham ।।
uv32#32.22: maitrāvihārī yo bhikṣuḥ prasanno buddhaśāsane । abhavyaḥ parihāṇāya nirvāṇasyaiva so 'ntike ।।
uv32#32.23: udagracittaḥ sumanā hy abhibhūya priyāpriyam । prāmodyabahulo bhikṣur duḥkhakṣayam avāpnuyāt ।।
uv32#32.25: nāsty aprajñasya vai dhyānaṁ prajñā nādhyāyato 'sti ca । yasya dhyānaṁ tathā prajñā sa vai nirvāṇasāntike ।।
uv32#32.26: tasmād dhyānaṁ tathā prajñām anuyujyeta paṇḍitaḥ । tasyāyam ādir bhavati tathā prājñasya bhikṣuṇaḥ ।।
uv32#32.27: saṁtuṣṭir indriyair guptiḥ prātimokṣe ca saṁvaraḥ । mātrajñatā ca bhakteṣu prāntaṁ ca śayanāsanam । adhicitte samāyogaṁ yasyāsau bhikṣur ucyate ।।
uv32#32.28: yasya kāyena vācā ca manasā ca na duṣkṛtam । kalyāṇaśīlam āhus taṁ hrīmantaṁ bhikṣum uttamam ।।
uv32#32.29: dharmāḥ subhāvitā yasya saptasaṁbodhapakṣikāḥ । kalyāṇadharmam āhus taṁ sadā bhikṣuṁ samāhitam ।।
uv32#32.30: ihaiva yaḥ prajānāti duḥkhasya kṣayam ātmanaḥ । kalyāṇaprajñam āhus taṁ sadā śīlam anāsravam ।।
uv32#32.31: na śīlavratamātreṇa bahuśrutyena vā punaḥ । tathā samādhilābhena viviktaśayanena vā ।।
uv32#32.32: bhikṣur viśvāsam āpadyed aprāpte hy āsravakṣaye । spṛśet tu saṁbodhisukham akāpuruṣasevitam ।।
uv32#32.33: tāpajāto hy ayaṁ lokaḥ skandhā nātmeti manyate । manyate yena yenāhaṁ tat tad bhavati cānyathā ।।
uv32#32.34: loko 'yam anyathābhūto bhavasakto bhave rataḥ ।bhavābhinandī satataṁ bhavān na parimucyate ।।
uv32#32.35: yan nandate sa hi bhavo duḥkhasya sa bibheti ca । uṣyate bhavahānāya brahmacaryaṁ mamāntike ।।
uv32#32.36: ye bhavena bhavasyaiva prāhur niḥsaraṇaṁ sadā । aniḥsṛtāṁ bhavā sarvāṁs tāṁ vadāmi sadā-v-aham ।।
uv32#32.37: pratītya duḥkham upadhiṁ bhavaty upadhisaṁbhavam । kṣayāt sarvopadhīnāṁ tu nāsti duḥkhasya saṁbhavaḥ ।।
uv32#32.38: anityā hi bhavāḥ sarve duḥkhā vipariṇāminaḥ । paśyataḥ prajñayā sarve kṣīyante nābhinanditāḥ ।।
uv32#32.39: nirvṛtasya sadā bhikṣor āyatyām upaśāmyate । abhibhūto bhavaḥ sarvo duḥkhāntaḥ sa nirucyate ।।
uv32#32.40: sadopaśāntacittasya vastucchinnasya bhikṣuṇaḥ । vikṣīṇo jātisaṁsāro mukto 'sau mārabandhanāt ।।
uv32#32.41: sadopaśāntacittasya vastucchinnasya bhikṣuṇaḥ । vikṣīṇo jātisaṁsāro nāstīdānīṁ punarbhavaḥ ।।
uv32#32.42: anavasrutacittasya vastucchinnasya bhikṣuṇaḥ । vikṣīṇo jātisaṁsāro mukto 'sau mārabandhanāt ।।
uv32#32.43: anavasrutacittasya vastucchinnasya bhikṣuṇaḥ । vikṣīṇo jātisaṁsāro nāstīdānīṁ punarbhavaḥ ।।

uv31#31.57: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata । cittena hi vañcitā prajā hy ekatyā preteṣu pacyate ।।
uv31#31.58: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata । citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā manujeṣu modate ।।
uv31#31.59: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata । citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā svargeṣu modate ।।
uv31#31.60: cittasya hi saṁyamaḥ sukhaṁ cittaṁ rakṣata mā pramadyata । citte tu surakṣite prajā hy ekatyā nirvāṇam āpnute ।।
uv10#10.1: śraddhātha hrīśīlam athāpi dānaṁ dharmā ime satpuruṣapraśastāḥ । etaṁ hi mārgaṁ divyaṁ vadanti etenāsau gacchati devalokam ।।
uv10#10.2: na vai kadaryā devalokaṁ vrajanti bālā hi te na praśaṁsanti dānam । śrāddhas tu dānaṁ hy anumodamāno 'py evaṁ hy asau bhavati sukhī paratra ।।
uv10#10.3: śraddhā hi vittaṁ puruṣasya śreṣṭhaṁ dharmaḥ sucīrṇaḥ sukham ādadhāti । satyaṁ hi vai svādutamaṁ rasānāṁ prajñājīvī jīvināṁ śreṣṭha uktaḥ ।।
uv10#10.4: śraddhādhano hy arhatāṁ dharmaṁ nirvāṇaprāptaye । śuśruṣur labhate prajñāṁ tatra tatra vicakṣaṇaḥ ।।
uv10#10.5: śraddhayā tarati hy ogham apramādena cārṇavam । vīryeṇa tyajate duḥkhaṁ prajñayā pariśudhyate ।।
uv10#10.7: yasya śraddhā ca śīlaṁ caivāhiṁsā saṁyamo damaḥ ।sa vāntadoṣo medhāvī sādhurūpo nirucyate ।।
uv10#10.8: śrāddhāḥ śīlena saṁpannas tyāgavāṁ vītamatsaraḥ । vrajate yatra yatraiva tatra tatraiva pūjyate ।।
uv10#10.9: yo jīvaloke labhate śraddhāṁ prajñāṁ ca paṇḍitaḥ । tad dhi tasya dhanaṁ śreṣṭhaṁ hīnam asyetarad dhanam ।।
uv10#10.10: āryāṇāṁ darśanaḥ kāmaḥ saddharmaśravaṇe rataḥ ।vinītamātsaryamalaḥ sa vai śrāddho nirucyate ।।
uv10#10.11: śrāddho gṛhṇāti pātheyaṁ puṇyaṁ coraiḥ sudurharam । coraṁ harantaṁ vārayati harantaḥ śramaṇāḥ priyāḥ । śramaṇān āgatāṁ dṛṣṭvā abhinandati paṇḍitāḥ ।।
uv10#10.12: dadanty eke yathā śraddhā yathāvibhavato janāḥ । tatra yo durmanā bhavati pareṣāṁ pānabhojane । nāsau divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati ।।
uv10#10.13: yasya tv ete samucchinnās tālamastakavad dhatāḥ । sa vai divā ca rātrau ca samādhim adhigacchati ।।
uv10#10.14: vītaśraddhaṁ na seveta hradaṁ yadvad dhi nirjalam । sa cet khanel labhet tatra vāri kardamagandhikam ।।
uv10#10.15: śrāddhaṁ prājñaṁ tu seveta hradaṁ yadvaj jalārthikaḥ ।acchodakaṁ viprasannaṁ śītatoyam anāvilam ।।
uv10#10.16: nānurakta iti rajyeta hy atra vai dīryate janaḥ ।aprasannāṁ varjayitvā prasannān upasevate ।।
uv25#25.1: aśrāddhebhiḥ kadaryebhiḥ piśunair vibhūtinandibhiḥ । sākhyaṁ kurvīta na prājñaḥ saṁgatiḥ pāpair hi pāpikā ।।
uv25#25.2: śrāddhebhiḥ peśalebhiś ca śīlavadbhir bahuśrutaiḥ । sākhyaṁ kurvīta saprajñaḥ saṁgatir bhadrair hi bhadrikā ।।
uv25#25.3: na bhajet pāpakaṁ mitraṁ na bhajet puruṣādhamam ।bhajeta mitraṁ kalyāṇaṁ bhajed uttamapūruṣam ।।
uv25#25.4: addhā narāḥ sevitavyāḥ śrutāḍhyāḥ sthānacintakāḥ ।. teṣāṁ hi śrutvā tu subhāṣitāni vināpi tebhyo labhate viśeṣam ।।
uv25#25.5: hīyati puruṣo nihīnasevī na tu khalu hāyeta tulyasevī । śreṣṭham upagato hy upaiti śraiṣṭhyaṁ tasmāc chreṣṭham ihātmano bhajeta ।।
uv25#25.6: śreyo hi labhate nityaṁ yaḥ śreṣṭhān upasevate । prajñayā cottamatamāṁ śīlenopaśamena ca ।।
uv25#25.7: pūtimatsyāṁ kuśāgreṇa yo naro hy upanahyate । kuśāpi pūtikā vānti hy evaṁ pāpopasevanāḥ ।।
uv25#25.8: tagaraṁ palāśapatreṇa yo naro hy upanahyati । patrāṇy api sugandhīni sad evaṁ saṁgamāt satām ।।
uv25#25.9: akurvann api pāpāni kurvāṇam upasevate । śaṅkito bhavati pāpasya avarṇaś cāsya vardhate ।।
uv25#25.10: saṁsevamānaḥ pāpo hi saṁspṛṣṭaḥ saṁspṛśet parān । śaro liptaḥ kalāpasthān aliptān upalimpati । upalepabhayād dhīro naiva pāpasakhā bhavet ।।
uv25#25.11: yādṛśaṁ kurute mitraṁ yādṛśaṁ copasevate । na cirāt tādṛśo bhavati saṁsevā hy asya tādṛśī ।।
uv25#25.12: tasmāt phalapuṭasyaiva dṛṣṭvā saṁpākam ātmanaḥ । asanto nopaseveta santaḥ seveta paṇḍitaḥ ।।
uv25#25.13: yāvajjīvaṁ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate । na sa dharmaṁ vijānāti darvī sūparasān iva ।।
uv25#25.14: muhūrtam api saprajñaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate । sa vai dharmaṁ vijānāti jihvā sūparasān iva ।।
uv25#25.15: yāvajjīvaṁ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate । na sa dharmaṁ vijānāti prajñā hy asya na vidyate ।।
uv25#25.16: muhūrtam api saprajñaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate । sa vai dharmaṁ vijānāti prajñā tasya hi vidyate ।।
uv25#25.17: yāvajjīvaṁ pi ced bālaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate । na sa dharmaṁ vijānāti samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam ।।
uv25#25.18: muhūrtam api saprajñaḥ paṇḍitāṁ paryupāsate । sa vai dharmaṁ vijānāti samyaksaṁbuddhadeśitam ।।
uv25#25.19: ekam arthapadaṁ proktaṁ paṇḍitasyārthakārakam । bālasya tu na kṛtyāya syāt sarvaṁ buddhabhāṣitam ।।
uv25#25.20: bālaḥ padasahasreṇa padam ekaṁ na budhyate । padenaikena medhāvī padānāṁ vindate śatam ।।
uv25#25.21: amitraḥ paṇḍitaḥ śreyāṁ na tu bālo 'nukampakaḥ । bālo 'nukampamāno hi narakān upakarṣati ।।
uv25#25.22: yo jānīyād ahaṁ bāla iti bālaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ । bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu bāla eva nirucyate ।।
uv25#25.23: yac ca bālaḥ praśaṁseta yac ca nindeta paṇḍitaḥ । nindā tu paṇḍitāc chreṣṭhā na tu bālāt praśaṁsanā ।।
uv25#25.24: bālaṁ na paśyec chṛṇuyān na ca no tena saṁvaset । duḥkho bālair hi saṁvāso hy amitreṇaiva sarvaśaḥ । dhīrais tu sukhasaṁvāso jñātīnām iva saṁgramaḥ ।।
uv25#25.25: dhīraṁ prājñaṁ niṣeveta śīlavantaṁ bahuśrutam । dhaureyaṁ javasaṁpannaṁ candraṁ tārāgaṇā iva ।।
uv12#12.1: āryasatyāni catvāri prajñayā paśyate yadā । eṣa mārgaṁ prajānāti bhavatṛṣṇāpradālanam ।।
uv12#12.2: uddhataṁ hi rajo vātair yathā vṛṣṭena śamyati । evaṁ śāmyanti saṁkalpāḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā ।।
uv12#12.3: śreṣṭhā hi prajñā loke 'smiṁ yeyaṁ nirvedhagāminī । yayā samyak prajānāti jātimaraṇasaṁkṣayam ।।
uv12#12.4: mārgeṣv aṣṭāṅgikaḥ śreṣṭhaś catvāry āryāṇi satyataḥ ।śreṣṭho virāgo dharmāṇāṁ cakṣuṣmāṁ dvipadeṣu ca ।।
uv12#12.5: anityāṁ sarvasaṁskārāṁ prajñayā paśyate yadā । atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye ।।
uv12#12.6: duḥkhaṁ hi sarvasaṁskārāṁ prajñayā paśyate yadā । atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye ।।
uv12#12.7: śunyataḥ sarvasaṁkārāṁ prajñayā paśyate yadā । atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye ।।
uv12#12.8: sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā paśyate yadā । atha nirvidyate duḥkhād eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye ।।
uv12#12.9: ākhyāto vo mayā mārgas tv ajñāyai śalyakṛntanaḥ । yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam ākhyātāras tathāgatāḥ ।।
uv12#12.10: deśito vo mayā mārgas tṛṣṇāśalyanikṛntanaḥ । yuṣmābhir eva karaṇīyam deṣṭāro hi tathāgatāḥ ।।
uv12#12.11: eṣo hi mārgo nāsty anyo darśanasya viśuddhaye । pratipannakāḥ prahāsyanti dhyāyino mārabandhanam ।।
uv12#12.12: eṣo 'ñjaso hy eṣa ca vai parākramas tv ekāyano haṁsapatho yathā hrade । yam adhyagāc chakyamuniḥ samāhitas tam eva cākhyāti gaṇeṣv abhīkṣṇaśaḥ ।।
uv12#12.13: ekāyanaṁ jātijarāntadarśī mārgaṁ vadaty eṣa hitānukampī । etena mārgeṇa hi tīrṇavantas tariṣyate ye prataranti caugham ।।
uv12#12.14: atyantaniṣṭhāya damāya śuddhaye saṁsārajātīmaraṇakṣayāya । anekadhātupratisaṁvidhāya mārgo hy ayaṁ lokavidā prakāśitaḥ ।।
uv12#12.15: gaṅgāgataṁ yadvad apetadoṣaṁ saṁsyandate vāri tu sāgareṇa । tathaiva mārgaḥ sugatapradeśitaḥ saṁsyandate 'yaṁ hy amṛtasya prāptaye ।।
uv12#12.16: yo dharmacakraṁ hy ananuśrutaṁ purā prāvartayat sarvabhūtānukampī । taṁ tādṛśaṁ devanarāgrasatvaṁ nityaṁ namasyeta bhavasya pāragam ।।
uv12#12.17: sadā vitarkāṁ kuśalāṁ vitarkayet sadā punaś cākusalāṁ vivarjayet । tato vitarkāṁś ca vicāritāni ca prahāsyate vṛṣṭir ivoddhataṁ rajaḥ ।।
uv12#12.18: sa vai vitarkopaśamena cetasā spṛśeta saṁbodhisukhaṁ hy anuttaram । śubhaṁ samādhiṁ manasā nibandhayed vivekajaṁ bhāvayitvāpramāṇam । pradālayitvā tribhur ālayāṁs trīṁ jahāti bandhāṁ nipakaḥ pratismṛtaḥ ।।
uv12#12.19: prajñāyudho dhyānabalopapetaḥ samāhito dhyānarataḥ smṛtātmā । lokasya buddhvā hy udayavyayaṁ ca vimucyate vedakaḥ sarvato 'sau ।।
uv12#12.20: sukhaṁ sukhārthī labhate samācaraṁ kīrtiṁ samāpnoti yaśaś ca sarvataḥ । ya āryam aṣṭāṅgikam āñjasaṁ śivaṁ bhāvayati mārgaṁ hy amṛtasya prāptaye ।।
uv14#14.1: akruddhasya hi yaḥ krudhyet karma pāpam akurvataḥ ।duḥkhaṁ tam eva spṛśati loke 'smiṁś ca paratra ca ।।
uv14#14.2: pūrvaṁ kṣiṇoti hātmānaṁ paścād bāhyaṁ vihiṁsati । sa hatas tv itaraṁ hanti vītaṁseneva pakṣiṇaḥ ।।
uv14#14.3: hantāraṁ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati । akroṣṭāraṁ tathākroṣṭā roṣitāraṁ ca roṣakaḥ ।।
uv14#14.4: anyatrāśravaṇād asya saddharmasyāvijānakāḥ । āyuṣy evaṁ paritte hi vairaṁ kurvanti kena cit ।।
uv14#14.5: pṛthakchabdāḥ samutpannās taṁ ca śreṣṭham iti manyathā । saṁghe hi bhidyamāne 'smiṁ śreṣṭham ity abhimanyathā ।।
uv14#14.6: asthicchidāṁ prāṇahṛtāṁ gavāśvadhanahāriṇāṁ । rāṣṭraṁ vilumpatāṁ caiva punar bhavati saṁgatam । yuṣmākaṁ nu kathaṁ na syād imaṁ dharmaṁ vijānatām ।। [i] asthicchinnāḥ prāṇaharā gavāśvadhanahārakāḥ । rāṣṭrāṇāṁ ca viloptāras teṣāṁ bhavati saṁgatam । yuṣmākaṁ nu kathaṁ na syād imaṁ dharmaṁ vijānatām ।। [ii]
uv14#14.7: paṇḍitābhā parāmṛṣṭā vāg yā gocarabhāṣiṇī । vyāyacchanti mukhaṁ vāmā yayā nītā na te budhāḥ ।।
uv14#14.8: pare hi na vijānanti vayam atrodyamāmahe । atra ye tu vijānanti teṣāṁ śāmyanti methakāḥ ।।
uv14#14.9: ākrośan mām avocan mām ajayan mām ajāpayet । atra ye hy upanahyanti vairaṁ teṣāṁ na śāmyati ।।
uv14#14.10: ākrośan mām avocan mām ajayan mām ajāpayet । atra ye nopanahyanti vairaṁ teṣāṁ praśāmyati ।।
uv14#14.11: na hi vaireṇa vairāṇi śāmyantīha kadā cana । kṣāntyā vairāṇi śāmyanti eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ ।।
uv14#14.12: vairaṁ na vaireṇa hi jātu śāmyec chāmyed avaireṇa tu vairabhāvaḥ । vairaprasaṅgo hy ahitāya dṛṣṭas tasmād dhi vairaṁ na karoti vidvān ।।
uv14#14.13: sa cel labhed vai nipakaṁ sahāyaṁ loke caraṁ sādhu hi nityam eva । abhibhūya sarvāṇi parisravāṇi careta tenāptamanā smṛtātmā ।।
uv14#14.14: sa cel labhed vai nipakaṁ sahāyaṁ loke caraṁ sādhu hi nityam eva । rājeva rāṣṭraṁ vipulaṁ prahāya ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryāt ।।
uv14#14.15: caraṁś ca nādhigaccheta sahāyaṁ tulyam ātmanaḥ । ekacaryāṁ dṛḍhaṁ kuryān nāsti bāle sahāyatā ।।
uv14#14.16: ekasya caritaṁ śreyo na tu bālaḥ sahāyakaḥ ।. ekaś caren na ca pāpāni kuryād alpotsuko 'raṇyagataiva nāgaḥ ।। [i] ekasya caritaṁ ṣreyo na tu bālasahāyatā । alposukaś cared eko mātaṅgāraṇye nāgavat ।। [ii]
uv13#13.1: phalaṁ vai kadaliṁ hanti phalaṁ veṇuṁ phalaṁ naḍam ।satkāraḥ kāpuruṣaṁ hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīṁ yathā ।।
uv13#13.2: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ । hanti bālasya śuklāṁśaṁ mūrdhānaṁ cāsya pātayet ।।
uv13#13.3: asanto lābham icchanti satkāraṁ caiva bhikṣuṣu । āvāseṣu ca mātsaryaṁ pūjāṁ parakuleṣu ca ।।
uv13#13.4: mām eva nityaṁ jānīyur gṛhī pravrajitas tathā । mama prativaśāś ca syuḥ kṛtyākṛtyeṣu keṣu cit ।।
uv13#13.5: iti bālasya saṁkalpā icchāmānābhivardhakāḥ ।anyā hi lābhopaniṣad anyā nirvāṇagāminī ।।
uv13#13.6: etaj jñātvā yathābhūtaṁ buddhānāṁ śrāvakaḥ sadā । satkāraṁ nābhinandeta vivekaṁ anubṛṁhayet ।।
uv13#13.7: na vyāyamente sarvatra nānyeṣāṁ puruṣo bhavet । nānyāṁ niḥśritya jīveta dharmeṇa na vaṇik caret ।।
uv13#13.8: svalābhaṁ nāvamanyeta nānyeṣāṁ spṛhako bhavet । anyeṣāṁ spṛhako bhikṣuḥ samādhiṁ nādhigacchati ।।
uv13#13.9: sukhaṁ jīvitum icchec cec chramaṇyārtheṣv avekṣavān । ahir mūṣakadurgaṁ vā seveta śayanāsanam ।।
uv13#13.10: sukhaṁ jīvitum icchec cec chramaṇyārtheṣv avekṣavān । itaretareṇa saṁtuṣyed ekadharmaṁ ca bhāvayet ।।
uv13#13.11: sukhaṁ jīvitum icchec cec chramaṇyārtheṣv avekṣavān । sāṁghikaṁ nāvamanyeta cīvaraṁ pānabhojanam ।।
uv13#13.12: alpajñāto 'pi ced bhavati śīleṣu susamāhitaḥ । vidvāṁsas taṁ praśaṁsanti śuddhājīvam atandritam ।।
uv13#13.13: traividyaḥ syāt sa ced bhikṣur mṛtyuhantā nirāsravaḥ । alpajñātam iti jñātvā hy avajānanty ajānakāḥ ।। [i] sa ced bhavati traividyo mṛtyuhāyī nirāsravaḥ ।jñātvālpajñāta iti tam avajānanty ajānakāḥ ।। [ii]
uv13#13.14: sa cet tv ihānnapānasya lābhī bhavati pudgalaḥ । pāpadharmāpi ced bhavati sa teṣāṁ bhavati pūjitaḥ ।।
uv13#13.15: bahūn amitrāṁ labhate saṁghāṭīpravṛtaḥ sadā । lābhī yo hy annapānasya vastraśayyāsanasya ca ।।
uv13#13.16: etad ādīnavaṁ jñātvā satkāreṣu mahābhayam ।alpajñāto hy anutsukaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet ।।
uv13#13.17: nāyam anaśanena jīvate nāhāro hṛdayasya śāntaye । āhāraḥ sthitaye tu vidyate taj jñātvā hi careta eṣaṇām ।।
uv13#13.18: paṅkas tv iti yo hi vindate nityaṁ vandanamānanā kule । sūkṣmaḥ śalyo duruddharaḥ satkāraḥ kāpuruṣeṇa dustyajaḥ ।।
uv28#28.2: dadataḥ puṇyaṁ pravardhate vairaṁ na kriyate ca saṁyamāt । kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṁ rāgadoṣamohakṣayāt tu nirvṛtiḥ ।।
uv28#28.3: sārdhaṁ carann ekakaḥ sadā miśro hy anyajanena vedakaḥ kuśalī prajahāti pāpakaṁ krauñcaḥ kṣīrapako yathodakam ।।
uv28#28.4: dṛṣṭvā hy ādīnavaṁ loke jñātvā dharmaniraupadhim । āryo na ramate pāpe pāpo na ramate śubhe ।।
uv28#28.5: pravivekarasaṁ jñātvā rasaṁ copaśamasya vai । nirjvaro bhavati niṣpāpo dharmaprītirasaṁ piban ।।
uv28#28.6: anavasrutacittasya tv anunnahanacetasaḥ । puṇyapāpaprahīṇasya nāsti durgatito bhayam ।।
uv28#28.7: niṣeddhāraṁ pravaktāraṁ yaj jāned vadyadarśinam । nigṛhyavādinaṁ dhīraṁ tādṛśaṁ satataṁ bhajet । tādṛśaṁ bhajamānasya śreyo bhavati na pāpakam ।।
uv28#28.8: upaśānto hy uparato mandabhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ । dhunāti pāpakāṁ dharmāṁ drumapatraṁ yathānilaḥ ।।
uv28#28.9: yo hy apraduṣṭasya narasya duṣyate śuddhasya nityaṁ vigatāṅgaṇasya । tam eva bālaṁ pratiyāti pāpaṁ kṣiptaṁ rajaḥ prativātaṁ yathaiva ।।
uv28#28.10: yad yat karoti puruṣas tat tat paśyati hātmanaḥ ।kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇaṁ pāpakārī ca pāpakam ।।
uv28#28.11: ātmanā hi kṛte pāpe tv ātmanā kliśyate sadā । ātmanā tv akṛte pāpe hy ātmanaiva viśudhyate ।।
uv28#28.12: aśuddhabuddhiṁ pratyātmaṁ nānyo hy anyaṁ viśodhayet । abhimathnāti taṁ pāpaṁ vajram aśmamaṇiṁ yathā ।।
uv28#28.13: cakṣuṣmāṁ viṣamānīva vidyamāne parākramet । paṇḍito jīvaloke 'smiṁ pāpāni parivarjayet ।।
uv28#28.14: vaṇig vā sabhayaṁ mārgam alpaśāstro mahādhano । viṣaṁ jīvitakāmo vā pāpāni parivarjayet ।।
uv28#28.15: pāṇau cāsya vraṇo na syād dhārayet pāṇinā viṣam ।nāvraṇe krāmati viṣaṁ nāsti pāpam akurvataḥ ।।
uv28#28.16: sukarāṇi hy asādhūni svātmano hy ahitāni ca । yad vai hitaṁ ca pathyaṁ ca tad vai paramaduṣkaram ।।
uv28#28.17: sukaraṁ sādhunā sādhu sādhu pāpena duṣkaram ।pāpaṁ pāpena sukaraṁ pāpam āryeṇa duṣkaram ।।
uv28#28.18: madhuvad manyate bālo yāvat pāpaṁ na pacyate । yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha duḥkhaṁ nigacchati ।।
uv28#28.19: pāpo 'pi paśyate bhadraṁ yāvat pāpaṁ na pacyate । yadā tu pacyate pāpam atha pāpāni paśyati ।।
uv28#28.20: bhadro 'pi paśyate pāpaṁ yāvad bhadraṁ na pacyate । yadā tu pacyate bhadram atha bhadrāṇi paśyati ।।
uv28#28.21: kuryāc cet puruṣaḥ pāpaṁ nainaṁ kuryāt punaḥ punaḥ ।na tatra cchandraṁ kurvīta duḥkhaṁ pāpasya saṁcayaḥ ।।
uv28#28.22: kuryāc cet puruṣaḥ puṇyaṁ kuryāc cainaṁ punaḥ punaḥ । tatra cchandraṁ ca kurvīta sukhaṁ puṇyasya saṁcayaḥ ।।
uv28#28.23: abhitvareta kalyāṇe pāpāc cittaṁ nivārayet । dhandhaṁ hi kurvataḥ puṇyaṁ pāpeṣu ramate manaḥ ।।
uv28#28.24: alpakaṁ pi kṛtaṁ pāpaṁ duḥkhāya parataḥ sadā । mahate bhavaty anarthāya viṣaṁ koṣṭhagataṁ yathā ।।
uv28#28.25: alpakaṁ pi kṛtaṁ puṇyaṁ paraloke sukhāvaham । arthāya mahate nityaṁ sasyānām iva saṁcayaḥ ।।
uv28#28.26: adaṇḍeṣu hi daṇḍena yo 'praduṣṭeṣu duṣyate ।daśānām anyatamaṁ sthānaṁ kṣipram eva nigacchati ।।
uv28#28.27: jñātīnāṁ vā vinābhāvaṁ bhogānāṁ vā parikṣayam । rājato hy upasargaṁ vāpy abhyākhyānaṁ ca dāruṇam ।।
uv28#28.28: vedanāṁ kaṭukāṁ vāpi śarīrasya ca bhedanam ।ābādhaṁ vāpi paruṣaṁ cittakṣepam athāpi vā ।।
uv28#28.29: atha vāsyāpy agārāṇi hy agnir dahati sarvathā । bhedāt kāyasya cāprājño daśamāṁ durgatiṁ vrajet ।।
uv28#28.30: pāpe tu kṛte hi nāśvasec cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi nāśvaset । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi nāśvased asti tasya vipāka iti nāśvaset ।।
uv28#28.31: puṇye tu kṛte hi ihāśvasec cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi cāśvaset । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi cāśvased asti tasya vipāka iti cāśvaset ।।
uv28#28.32: pāpe tu kṛte hi śocate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi śocate । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi śocate asti tasya vipāka iti śocate ।।
uv28#28.33: puṇye tu kṛte hi nandate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi nandate । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi nandate asti tasya vipāka iti nandate ।।
uv28#28.34: iha śocati pretya śocati pāpakarmā hy ubhayatra śocati । sa hi śocati sa praśocati dṛṣṭvā karma hi kliṣṭam ātmanaḥ ।।
uv28#28.35: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛtapuṇyo hy ubhayatra nandati । sa hi nandati sa pramodate dṛṣṭvā karma hi viśuddham ātmanaḥ ।।
uv28#28.36: pāpe tu kṛte hi śocate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi śocate । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi śocate bhūyaḥ śocati durgatiṁ gataḥ ।।
uv28#28.37: puṇye tu kṛte hi nandate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi nandate । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi nandate bhūyo nandati sadgatiṁ gataḥ ।।
uv28#28.38: puṇye tu kṛte hi modate cirakṛte dūrakṛte 'pi modate । rahasi ca kṛte 'pi modate bhūyo modati sadgatiṁ gataḥ ।।
uv28#28.39: kṛte ca pāpe 'py akṛte ca puṇye 'dharmaṁ samādāya vihāya dharmam । bibheti mṛtyor iha pāpakarmā bhinnaplavo madhya ivodakasya ।।
uv28#28.40: kṛtaṁ ca puṇyaṁ hy akṛtaṁ ca pāpaṁ satāṁ ca dharmaś caritaḥ purāṇaḥ । bibheti mṛtyor na kadaṁ cid eva yathaiva nāvā dṛḍhayā tarantaḥ ।।
uv3#3.1: vitarkapramathitasya jantunas tīvrarāgasya śubhānudarśinaḥ । bhūyas tṛṣṇā pravardhate gāḍhaṁ hy eṣa karoti bandhanam ।।
uv3#3.2: vitarkavyupaśame tu yo rato hy aśubhāṁ bhāvayate sadā smṛtaḥ । tṛṣṇā hy eṣa prahāsyate sa tu khalu pūtikaroti bandhanam ।।
uv3#3.3: kāmāndhajālaprakṣiptās tṛṣṇayācchāditāḥ prajāḥ । pramattā bandhane baddhā matsyavat kupināmukhe । jarāmaraṇam āyānti vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka iva mātaram ।।
uv3#3.4: manujasya pramattacāriṇas tṛṣṇā vardhati māluteva hi । sa hi saṁsarate punaḥ punaḥ phalam icchann iva vānaro vane ।।
uv3#3.5: saritāni vai snehitāni vai saumanasyāni bhavanti jantunaḥ । ye sātasitāḥ sukhaiṣiṇas te vai jātijaropagā narāḥ ।।
uv3#3.6: tṛṣṇābhir upaskṛtāḥ prajāḥ paridhāvanti śaśā va vāgurām ।saṁyojanaiḥ saṅgasaktā duḥkhaṁ yānti punaḥ punaś cirarātram ।।
uv3#3.7: tṛṣṇayā grathitāḥ satvā raktacittā bhavābhave । te yogayukta māreṇa hy ayogakṣemiṇo janāḥ । jarāmaraṇam āyānti yogā hi duratikramāḥ ।।
uv3#3.8: yas tu tṛṣṇāṁ prahāyeha vītatṛṣṇo bhavābhave । tṛṣṇayā vibhavad bhikṣur anicchuḥ parinirvṛtaḥ ।।
uv3#3.9: ya etāṁ sahate grāmyāṁ tṛṣṇāṁ loke sudustyajām । śokās tasya nivardhante hy avavṛṣṭā bīraṇā yathā ।।
uv3#3.10: yas tv etāṁ tyajate grāmyāṁ tṛṣṇāṁ loke sudustyajām । śokās tasya nivartante udabindur iva puṣkarāt ।।
uv3#3.11: tad vai vadāmi bhadraṁ vo yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ ।tṛṣṇāṁ samūlāṁ khanata uśīrārthīva bīraṇām । tṛṣṇāyāḥ khātamūlāyā nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam ।।
uv3#3.12: tṛṣṇādvitīyaḥ puruṣo dīrgham adhvānam āśayā । punaḥ punaḥ saṁsarate garbham eti punaḥ punaḥ । itthaṁbhāvānyathībhāvaḥ saṁsare tv āgatiṁ gatim ।।
uv3#3.13: tāṁ tu tṛṣṇāṁ prahāyeha vītatṛṣṇo bhavābhave । nāsau punaḥ saṁsarate tṛṣṇā hy asya na vidyate ।।
uv3#3.14: yayā devā manuṣyāś ca sitās tiṣṭhanti hārthikāḥ ।tarataitāṁ viṣaktikāṁ kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt । kṣaṇātītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ ।।
uv3#3.15: tṛṣṇā hi hetuḥ saritā viṣaktikā gaṇḍasya nityaṁ visṛteha jālinī । latāṁ pipāsām apanīya sarvaśo nivartate duḥkham idaṁ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
uv3#3.16: yathāpi mūlair anupadrutaiḥ sadā chinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punar eva jāyate । evaṁ hi tṛṣṇānuśayair anuddhṛtair nivartate duḥkham idaṁ punaḥ punaḥ ।।
uv3#3.17: yathāpi śalyo dṛḍham ātmanā kṛtas tam eva hanyād balasā tv adhiṣṭhitaḥ । tathā tv ihādhyātmasamutthitā latās tṛṣṇā vadhāyopanayanti prāṇinām ।।
uv3#3.18: etad ādīnavaṁ jñātvā tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya saṁbhavam । vītatṛṣṇo hy anādānaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet ।
uv8#8.1: abhūtavādī narakān upaiti yaś cānyad apy ācaratīha karma । ubhau hi tau pretya samau niruktau nihīnadharmau manujau paratra ।।
uv8#8.2: pruṣasya hi jātasya kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe । yayā chinatti hātmānaṁ vācā durbhāṣitaṁ vadan ।।
uv8#8.3: yo nindiyāṁ praśaṁsati tān api nindati ye praśaṁsiyāḥ । sa cinoti mukhena taṁ kaliṁ kalinā tena sukhaṁ na vindati ।।
uv8#8.4: alpamātro hy ayaṁ kalir ya ihākṣeṇa dhanaṁ parājayet । ayam atra mahattaraḥ kalir yaḥ sugateṣu manaḥ pradūṣayet ।।
uv8#8.5: śataṁ sahasrāṇi nirarbudāni ṣaṭtrimśatiṁ pañca tathārbudāni । yān āryagarhī narakān upaiti vācaṁ manaś ca praṇidhāya pāpakam ।।
uv8#8.6: asataṁ hi vadanti pāpacittā narakaṁ vardhayate vadhāya nityam ।anavadyabalas titīkṣate tāṁ manaso hy āvilatāṁ vivarjayitvā ।।
uv8#8.7: yaḥ śāsanaṁ hy arhatām āryāṇāṁ dharmajīvinām । pratikrośati durmedhā dṛṣṭiṁ niḥśritya pāpikām । phalaṁ kaṇṭakaveṇur vā phalaty ātmavadhāya saḥ ।।
uv8#8.8: kalyāṇikāṁ vimuñceta naiva muñceta pāpikām । muktā kalyāṇikī śreyo muktā tapati pāpikā ।।
uv8#8.9: na ca mukte pramuñcet tāṁ muñcamāno hi bādhyate । naivam āryāḥ pramuñcanti muktā bālair hi pāpikā ।।
uv8#8.10: mukhena saṁyato bhikṣur mandabhāṣī hy anuddhataḥ । arthaṁ dharmaṁ ca deśayati madhuraṁ tasya bhāṣitam ।।
uv8#8.11: subhāṣitaṁ hy uttamam āhur āryā dharmaṁ vaden nādharmaṁ tad dvitīyam । priyaṁ vaden nāpriyaṁ tat tṛtīyaṁ satyaṁ vaden nāsatyaṁ tac caturtham ।।
uv8#8.12: tām eva vācaṁ bhāṣeta yayātmānaṁ na tāpayet । parāṁś ca na vihiṁseta sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā ।।
uv8#8.13: priyodyam eva bhāṣeta yā hi vācābhinanditā । nādadāti yayā pāpaṁ bhāṣamāṇaḥ sadā priyam ।।
uv8#8.14: satyā syād amṛtā vācā satyavācā hy anuttarā । satyam arthe ca dharme ca vācam āhuḥ pratiṣṭhitām ।।
uv8#8.15: yāṁ buddho bhāṣate vācaṁ kṣemāṁ nirvāṇaprāptaye । duḥkhasyāntakriyāyuktāṁ sā hi vāk sādhu bhāṣitā ।।
uv15#15.1: ānāpānasmṛtir yasya paripūrṇā subhāvitā । anupūrvaṁ parijitā yathā buddhena deśitā । sa imaṁ bhāsate lokam abhramuktaiva candramāḥ ।।
uv15#15.2: sthitena kāyena tathaiva cetasā sthito niṣaṇṇo 'py atha vā śayānaḥ । nityaṁ smṛto bhikṣur adhiṣṭhamāno labheta pūrvāparato viśeṣam । labdhvā ca pūrvāparato viśeṣam adarśanaṁ mṛturājasya gacchet ।।
uv15#15.3: smṛtiḥ kāyagatā nityaṁ saṁvaraś cendriyaiḥ sadā । samāhitaḥ sa jānīyāt tena nirvāṇam ātmanaḥ ।।
uv15#15.4: yasya syāt sarvataḥ smṛtiḥ satataṁ kāyagatā hy upasthitā । no ca syān no ca me syān na bhaviṣyati na ca me bhaviṣyati । anupūrvavihāravān asau kālenottarate viṣaktikām ।।
uv15#15.5: yo jāgaret smṛtimāṁ saṁprajānaḥ samāhito mudito viprasannaḥ । kālena dharmāṁ mīmāṁsamānaḥ so 'tikramej jātijarāṁ saśokām ।।
uv15#15.6: tasmāt sadā jāgarikāṁ bhajeta yo vīryavāṁ smṛtimān apramattaḥ । saṁyojanaṁ jātijarāṁ ca hitvā ihaiva duḥkhasya karoti so 'ntam ।।
uv15#15.7: jāgarantaḥ śṛṇudhvaṁ me suptāś ca pratibudhyata । supteṣu jāgaraṁ śreyā na hi jāgarato bhayam ।।
uv15#15.8: jāgaryam anuyuktānām ahorātrānuśikṣiṇām । amṛtaṁ cādhimuktānām astaṁ gacchanti āsravāḥ ।।
uv15#15.9: lābhas teṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ ye buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gatāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ buddhagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.10: lābhas teṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ ye dharmaṁ śaraṇaṁ gatāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ dharmagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.11: lābhas teṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ ye saṁghaṁ śaraṇaṁ gatāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ saṁghagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.12: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ buddhagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.13: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ dharmagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.14: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ saṁghagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.15: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ kāyagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.15A: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ samādhayaḥ smṛtāḥ ।।
uv15#15.16: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ śīlagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.16A: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ tyāgagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.16B: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ devagatā smṛtiḥ ।।
uv15#15.17: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau caivāhiṁsāyāṁ rataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.18: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau caivāvyāpāde rataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.19: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca naiṣkramye 'bhirataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.20: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nityaṁ dhyānarataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.21: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca viveke 'bhirataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.22: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca śunyatāyāṁ rataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.23: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau caivānimitte rataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.24: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca ākiñcanye rataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.25: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca bhāvanāyāṁ rataṁ manaḥ ।।
uv15#15.26: suprabuddhaṁ prabudhyante ime gautamaśrāvakāḥ । yeṣāṁ divā ca rātrau ca nirvāṇe 'bhirataṁ manaḥ ।।
